54b5(rgyud): ni shAkya'i yul du skye ba blangs te/ des 'di skad du ma 'ong / sa pa'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi bstan pa/ bdag gis bshig par gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/ 
54b6(rgyud): de yang gzhan yin par mi blta'i sum pa'i rgyal po gang li yul 'jig par byed pa de yin// kun tu rgyur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa nga yin// bud med gang gis
54b7(rgyud): kun tu rgyu la 'o ma byin pa de ni rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med gang gis sangs rgyas dko' ba spyod pa spyad nas ba nings pa la thog mar zhal zas dbul ba 'di yino// de nas de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom
54b8(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nga'i yul der sum pa dang gdong dmar dog 'ong ba de'i rgyu ni 'di yin te/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de'i tshe rgyal po dang
55a1(rgyud): yul na/ bud med gzhan zhig la bu zhig yod pa de/ zhing spro ba'i phyir phyi rol tu byung ngo // der mi gzhan zhig gis kyang de'i 'dag tu zhing rmo so// de nas bud med de'i bu des/ mi
55a2(rgyud): de'i rgyal ba dang / shing gzhong dang / phye dang / zong dag cig brkus te/ phye dang zong la sogs pa brkus pa'i phyir/ ba bdag su pa dang / gdong dmar rnams li yul du 'ong bar 'gyuraro// bud med
55a3(rgyud): de'i bu gang gis phye dang / rkyal ba dang / shing gzhong dang / zong khyer ba de ni/ li'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// mi gang gi rgyal ba la sogs pa rdzas phrogs pa ni/ de'i tshe gdong dmar gyi rgyal por 'gyur
55a4(rgyud): ro ra ba de dag ni de'i tshe dmag mir 'gyur ro// mi de'i mar gyur dpa'i bud med de ni/ de'i tshe li yul gyi rgyal po'i mar 'gyur/ da ro// ma byin par len pa byed byed pa'i mi de'i mas ni pe de blangs
55a5(rgyud): te/ sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong grong khyer mdzes zhes bya ba la bsod snyomasu phul te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des na yang mir skye ba thob par 'gyuraro// mi de ni ma la phyi byin pa dang / 
55a6(rgyud): mas kyang dge slong grong khyer mdzes la phul ba de'i bsod nams bsags pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ li yul du dpa' sbed ces bya bar 'gyur te/ rgyu des na rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya bar
55a7(rgyud): yang gyur nas/ rgyal srid thob par gyur te/ skar rdor g.yul 'gyed par 'gyuraro// phye sbyin par byed pa de ni rgyu des na mir skye ba thob par 'gyur te/ mo des lam gyi 'gram na 'bras smos// der mi gang
55a8(rgyud): dag gis 'bras can chung gzan par byas pa de ni de'i tshe dge slong du gyur te/ des na de dag gis dge 'dun gyi nor yul gyi glung du 'jal bar 'gyuraro// der bya sna tshogs kyis 'bras zos pa gang yin
55b1(rgyud): pa de dag ni/ de'i tshe li'i rgyal po'i bran du 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di ltar li yul du mi rgol mang po 'thung bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis ni gang / 
55b2(rgyud): gi tshe/ gzhon nu dge byed skyes pa de la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe sdig byed skyes pa na de la gnod pa byed par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe mi rgod lnga brgya po de dag rgyal po yab kyi thad du gtong
55b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// me rgod de dag kyang li yul der skye ba len par 'gyur te/ dge 'dun gyi nor dang / mchod rten gyi nor chud gzon par byed do// mi rgod de dag kyang ston ma byin par len pa byed byed pa'i
55b4(rgyud): phyir/ yan lag bcan nas bsad pa des na de dag gis kyang li 'i rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i grags pa gsod par 'gyuraro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus su mi rgod de dag 'khor ba las grol ba
55b5(rgyud): byed pa'i dge slong zla ba dag pa zhi bya ba zhig kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal sngon gyis ngas rgyas rnams kyi yab kyi bya ba byed byed pa 'di yin te/ de ban
55b6(rgyud): du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas de dag gi sku gdung yang 'dzin par
55b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal bram ze dro nas gau tra zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa zhig du 'gyur te/ gang
55b8(rgyud): gi tshe rgyal po rnams phan tshun du g.yul 'gyed par chas pa de'i tshe bram ze dron sa go tras/ bum pa bzang po blangs nas sku gdung bged par byed do// gang gi tshe li yul du/ byang chub sems dpa'
56a1(rgyud): bal po ches byung ba dang / mchod rten phal po che dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dang / dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba mdzes pa dag ma byung ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'/ 
56a2(rgyud): 'jam dpal grong khyer du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med du 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi spyod pa ji lta bu zhe na/ thams cad 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gtsu
56a3(rgyud): can yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du yang snang / rgyal po ji lta ba bzhin du yang snang / rgyal mo ji lta ba dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze'i gzugs ji lta bu dang / 'dod
56a4(rgyud): pa'i khamasu gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bar du tha dmas cad du 'jug par 'gyur te/ rol mo mkhan rol me'i gnas lo mkhas pa gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs thams
56a5(rgyud): cad ston pa bzhin no// chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i se/ mas can gyi thang du yang shin tu lhags par ston to// / ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal bud med kyi
56a6(rgyud): gzugasu ston ce na/ gang gi phyir bud med lhag par 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la char pa'i sem dang ldan pa ni shin tu glen zhing shin tu ser sna tsho bas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal lhag
56a7(rgyud): bar bud med du ston to// bud med byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa dag kyang yod pas na/ de'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal de lta bur byed do// bud med du skyes nas snying rje chen por thob
56a8(rgyud): par 'gyur ba'i dus kyang yod do// bud med rnams 'dzem par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i skyon rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / skyes pa gzhan spong bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do// gang gi tshe ba bdag
56b1(rgyud): sum pa der 'ongs te/ mchod rten chen po rnams dang / dri gtsang khang mang po dang / dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba bzang po rnams sreg par 'gyur ba lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis rtogs pa de'i tshe/ 
56b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis lha mo de la 'di skad ces smras te/ sring mo sdug pa gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying po grong khyer du gshegs pa de na/ nga khyod
56b3(rgyud): kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur te/ der 'o bu cag gnyis kyis byang chub kyi phyir dang / sems can 'jigs shing skrag pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gis yongasu bskyang bar bya'o// 
56b4(rgyud): zhes smon lam btab pa'i dus de dran par gyis shig/ srid mo sdug pa ji ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ rdo rje'i sde dang gnyis kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'
56b5(rgyud): mnos pa dran par gyis shig/ gzungs sngags de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag dang / 'od zer gang dgakhyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o tshe/ 'dir
56b6(rgyud): mthong ba de dag ngas rgyas par bshad kyis zung la bris te/ de'i ming po'i thad du khyer cig/ mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasu sangs rgyas de dag gis 'od zer btang ba yang / li yul 'di bcom
56b7(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i phyag 'tshan yin la/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ der skye ba len par 'gyur ba'i phyiraro// chos kyi rgyal po'i ma
56b8(rgyud): rten de dag la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pal po che de dag gi sku gdung mang po gnas pa de dag lha mo de'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te/ mchod pa'i phyir sems can de dag la bgeng par byed// yul der
57a1(rgyud): lha me de snying rje skye bar 'gyur te/ ci nas mchod pa'i gan su 'gyur bar byed do// de nas grong khyer gyi nang du khang pa shin tu mdzes par bya ste/ grong khyer de na mi ji snyed gnas pa de/ 
57a2(rgyud): dag der ci nas bsod nams byed par 'gyur zhing 'dzin pa dang / mchod pa dang / rtse bar byed par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas spyod pa de la 'jug par 'gyur bar bya'o// ci'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan
57a3(rgyud): 'das rnams kyis li yul gyi phyir chos yang dag par 'gro ba mdzad ce na/ li yul bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i phyag mtshan yin pa dang / bskal pa bzang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad
57a4(rgyud): ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi phyag mtshan yin pa dang / ri glang mgo dang goms la gan d+ha'i mchod rten du/ bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'du bar 'gyur ba dang / li yum
57a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i gnasu 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka'
57a6(rgyud): stsal pa/ gang gi tshe gdong dmar dang / rgya 'thab pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe nu bo khyod kyis bya ba'i dus la bab bo// rab nges kyang sems can la phan pa'i phyir shes bzhin du yang skye ba len par
57a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'dir 'od zer btang nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la skyes bskur te/ skyes de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
57a8(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis 'dir khyer te 'ongs nas/ sems can 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ snying rjes sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang byul to// gzungs sngagaso de dag dang / 
57b1(rgyud): 'od zer de dag kyang / li yul gyi don tu sangs rgyas kyis bzhes nas de dag gi grogasu gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang ci nas li yul de 'jig par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir
57b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas shi 'phos nas/ der skye ba len par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe li yul du gnod pa byung na de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan dang / gzungs de dag dang / 'od
57b3(rgyud): zer gyi ming de dag bris te/ grong khyer gyi sgo rnamasu bzhag la/ dmag gi nang du yang bris te/ rgyal mtshan la gdag so// yang na ming de dag 'dzin du gzhug cing bklag pa dang bcang bar
57b4(rgyud): bya'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / mu ge rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs 'phel bar bya ba dang / sdig pa 'byang bar bya ba dang / nad las thar par bya ba rnams
57b5(rgyud): la yang phan par byed pa yin// gang la sdig pa lci ba yod na/ des zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du phyogs bcu'i sa/ ngas rgyas rnams la rim gro byas te/ sku gdung dang ldan
57b6(rgyud): pa'i mchod rten nam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na/ dge ba'i phyogs las gang 'dod pa myur du thob par 'gyur te/ 'od zer de dag kyang de'i steng du
57b7(rgyud): gnas par 'gyuraro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'od pa la yang bzlas brjod bya'o// yang na nyin gcig bzhin du lan bdun bdun bklag par bya'o// gang sdug bsngal bar gyur pa 'am/ nad pa 'a
57b8(rgyud): yang na ji lta bur 'dod kyang rung ste/ bzlas brjod pa'o// yang na bklag par bya'o// ci ste mi klog na yang skud pa la mdad pa bdun bor te/ lan bdun bdun bzlas brjod byas nas btags na sdug
58a1(rgyud): / bsngal las thar par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gang gi sgo la btags na/ grong khyer der dgra 'ong mi nus par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang
58a2(rgyud): gi tshe gdong dmar dang rgya 'thab pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde bcom ldan 'das kyi lasu bskos pa de/ rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya bar gyur pa na/ phrin yi ge 'di gser gyi rigs kyi yul du/ 
58a3(rgyud): khyer la phrin yig 'di gser gyi rigs kyi rgyal po la bstan par bya ste/ mi mang po'i mig sngar ni bstan par mi bya'o// yul de'i glud kyang khyer la kha cig ni der bskur bar bya'o// kha cig ni skar rdor bzhag
58a4(rgyud): pabar bya'o// gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du sngon byung ba ni 'di lta bu'o// ma 'ongs pa'i du das na ni 'di ltar 'gyur zhes bka' stsal pa/ de'i tshe bcom
58a5(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// zla ba'i tog ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
58a6(rgyud): mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / thams cad kyi rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting
58a7(rgyud): nge 'dzin dang / dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin bcu po 'di
58a8(rgyud): dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs nas smin mtshams kyi gseb nas/ snang ba chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ngo // 'od zer de las kyang 'od zer bcu byung nas
58b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du song ngo // song nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med par 'phros so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed yod pa'i zhing de dag thams
58b2(rgyud): cad du ji ltar li yul du/ gzhon nu rdo rje'i sde dang / lha me dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi phyir sngar bshad pa bzhin du tshig du brjod pa de dag byung ngo // de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
58b3(rgyud): dag dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas dgongs pa 'thun par rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di gsungs so// twadad+ya thA/ bo d+hi bi d+hi/ sarba a laM kA ra/ ba
58b4(rgyud): ra ga ta d+harma tsakrab ra ga ta/ ma ra se n+yA ba ra ga ta/  a bi sha ya ba ra ga ta/ oM bi d+yA pra t+yA ya saM skA ra pra t+ya daya/ na ma rU pra tA ya/ b+ha ba t+yA ya ni rud d+ha pra t+yA ya/ ta thA/ 
58b5(rgyud): ga ta/ ma ra Na ha ra/ bud+d+ha sa t+ye na/ de ba sat+ya na/ nA ga sa t+ye na rak+Sha sa t+ye na a su ra sa t+ye na/ sarba ba rAt+na satwe na/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di
58b6(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs te/ gang gi tshe lha mo dri med pa'i 'od kyis thos pa de'i mad la/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs sngags rtogs par 'gyuraro// gang gi tshe la yul gyi
58b7(rgyud): don gyi phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos 'di gsungs pa de'i tshe/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis thal mo sbar te 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis
58b8(rgyud): mkhyen pa lags te/ bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis/ so sor rgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i
59a1(rgyud): 'dab ma dri ma med pa'i rgyu sa kyi la lo// mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ma'i don bgyi ba dang / 
59a2(rgyud): dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po don du gnyer ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i drung du smon lam gdab pa'i slad du mchis te/ dge bsnyen ma hA sha zhes bya bar gyur nas/ bram ze
59a3(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i rdul dang mjal ba slan chad lung bstan pa thob ste/ de'i tshe der smon lam btab pas gang du khyod sangs rgyasu 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der bdag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par gyur
59a4(rgyud): cig/ ces bgyis nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa dar snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis so sor rgyan pa zhes bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa'i rgyu skar gyi
59a5(rgyud): rgyal po mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i sangs rgyu sa kyi zhing de nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i drung du mchis nas/ 
59a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams ni chags shing zhen la/ zhe sdang nga rgyal gyis khengs pa dang / bgying ba ste/ de
59a7(rgyud): dngag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams phan tshun las chen po nyam su len par byed de/ de dag gi sdig pa rnams tsha rabs kun tu sel bar byed do zhes gsungs so// de'i tshe bdag/ 
59a8(rgyud): gis smon lam btab pa/ ji lta bu'i tshul dang / thabs kyis der gzhan dag mchi ba de bzhin du bdag kyang mchi bar gyur cig ces bgyis nas/ de'i tshe tshe rabs snga ma la bdag gi mar
59b1(rgyud): gyur pa de'i don bgyi ba dang / ci nas ngan song gsum du mi mchi bar bgyi ba'i slang du skye ba blangs so// sngon gyi mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su/ dge bsnyen ma du sha zhes bgyi bar gyur pa dang / 
59b2(rgyud): gzhon nu nor bzang gis rnam par thar pa bdag la dris pa/ slan chad bdag gis mi'i nang du mi'i skye ba blangs te/ bdag gis sems can dag dang / 'dod chags spyad nas mi gzhan gyis
59b3(rgyud): bdag la khro mo dang / glen mar mthong ngo // sems can rnams yongasu grol ba'i slad du/ bud med kyi nang du mi bzad pa'i skye ba mang po dag blangs te/ rgyal mo dang / rgyal po'i bu mo dang / 
59b4(rgyud): bud med pa la dang / smad 'tsheng ma dang / sdug 'phongs pa dang / bud med dbul mo dag tu gyur te/ bud med du skyes pa rnams kyi don bgyid pa dang / bud med rnams yongasu grol bar
59b5(rgyud): bgyid// rang gi las kyi dbang gis ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spyad kyang sems can de dag mgu bar ma nus te/ tshe rabs du mar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir senaH
59b6(rgyud): don gyi slad du/ sdug bsngal mang po nyam su myong ste/ bud med du skye bas shin tu skyo bar gyur na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis sug las chen por bka' stsal te/ tshe rabs grangs ma mchis
59b7(rgyud): bapar bdag gis sdug bsngal bzod par bgyi 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mnyes par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa'i slad du/ bdag gis smon lam chen po btab pa/ sems
59b8(rgyud): can ni thams cad la phan pa'i slad du/ tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bdag la sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ba thams cad bdag gis bzod par bgyi'o// yul de bsrungs shig ces bcom ldan 'das
60a1(rgyud): / kyis bdag la bka' stsal pa/ gang lags pa de nang dung ming yang ma mchis/ yul yang ma byung mod kyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dang / 'khor der 'dus pa lnga dang / klu/ 
60a2(rgyud): dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad las dam pa blang bar bgyi'o// ji srid du bad
60a3(rgyud): tshe rabs de dag tu skye ba na/ bdag la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang gi gzhir mthong na yang / bdag la sdig par ma gyur cig/ ci rigs par skye ba'i dus 'tshal bar 'gyur la/ 'di lta bu yongasu 'dzin
60a4(rgyud): bar gyur cig/ gang gi tshe li yul thog mar byung ba'i dus la dbab pa na/ de'i tshe yul bgyid pa'i slad du der bdag tho dag mar rgyal por gyur cig/ li yul du nam rgyal po de dag
60a5(rgyud): gi ming chags shing / rgyal rabs thog ma byung ba na/ tsher/ bas bdun du rgyal po byed par gyur cig/ grong khyer dang ra ldan zhes bgyi ba yang bgyi'o// bal po se'u tshal du ni/ 
60a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten chen po bgyi'o// yul rta mjug tu ni chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i mchod rten bgyi'o// 'gum ti ra ra ni dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba chen po bgyi'o// rtsa rma ba nar yang dge
60a7(rgyud): 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba chen po bgyi'o// pa ya di kar ni dri gtsang khang chen po dang / mchod rten chen po bgyi ste/ ji srid du bdag rgyal srid la gnas pa de srid du las chen po dag bgyi'o// gang
60a8(rgyud): gi tshe rgyal po las shi 'phos par gyur pa na yang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa gang na bzhugs pa'i lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ bdag de na mchis pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams
60b1(rgyud): dran par gyur cig/ de nas slar yang li yul 'dir skye ba len cing / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du bud med kyi gzugasu gyur te/ skar rdo'i rgyal po'i bu mo rab nges
60b2(rgyud): zhes bya bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzungs sngags ji snyed gsungs pa dang / bdag gis rtogs pa gang lags pa'i gzugs sngags de dag thams cad de'i
60b3(rgyud): tshe/ bdag gis dran par gyur cig/ mdo sde 'di yang shin tu dran par gyur te/ ci nas thams cad rgyas par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe dmag sde gnyis 'thab par 'gyur ba dang / li yul
60b4(rgyud): gyi don gyi phyir la su bya ba yod par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe gzhon nu rdo rje sde skar rdo'i rgyal po rnam dpar rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya bar gyur nas/ li yul gyi phyir
60b5(rgyud): glud 'jal ba'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe/ bdag rab nges zhes bya bar gyur pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang / 'khor de'i nang du ji snyed 'dus par
60b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i lha de dag thams cad grogs su gyur te/ mdo 'di dang gzungs sngags rnams bshad pa'i gzugs sngags de dag thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad bdag gis tshe rabs thams
60b7(rgyud): cad du dran par gyur cig ces byas// gang gi tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis tshig de skad ces smras pa de'i tshe des ting nge 'dzin rnams thob ste/ ci nas mdo 'di la sus kyang gnod pa byed mi nus par 'gyur
60b8(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin theg pa chen po'i mdo dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i klong 'khyil ba zhes bya ba thob ste/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang
61a1(rgyud): gi tshe khyod las rtsom pa de'i tshe/ 'od zer de dag steng du gnas par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe gang gis mdo 'di dran par 'gyur zhing / shin tu nyam su len par 'gyur ba'i ting 'dzin
61a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas yid la byed pa zhes bya ba rtogs par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags gsungs pa de'i rang bzhin gang gis// gzung
61a3(rgyud): sngags rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / ting 'dzin sbyong ba dang / sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las chos thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dran par byed do// lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od
61a4(rgyud): des kyang / byang chub sems dpa' dag gis ting nge 'dzin dang // gzungs sngags ji ltar rtogs pa de de bzhin du/ rtogs par byed do// rnam par rgyal ba'i go chas kyang rgyal
61a5(rgyud): srid thob par 'gyur te/ gzhan gyis bar chad byed mi nuso// de dag gi las ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la/ gnas kyi rigs sngags gang gis sdig pa rnams 'byung bar
61a6(rgyud): 'gyur bar yang brjod par bya ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjod na/ lo bdun gyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs sngags rtogs par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
61a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog gi char pab ste/ lha'i rol mo'i sgra bsgrags nas/ 'di skad ces smras/ 
61a8(rgyud): bdag cag gis kyang sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las thos pa'i gzungs sngags rnams stsal bar bgyi'o// na ma sarba a tru dag ta/ badz+ra maN+Da lo ta ma sa/ ta thA ga tras/ ka g+his t+ya/ 
61b1(rgyud): s+yaHb+ho d+hi satwa s+ya/ trad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha sa t+ye na/ das bi ri/ de na ha ya ri/ ku tsi ru pra ti/ ba da ri ba b+hi ba tu/ tsi tu/ ma tu ga la ra ya ka da ma pa tu/ sa pa dza ma sar ta swAhA// gzungs sngags 'dra/ 
61b2(rgyud): ni lha rnams chad pas gcod pa'i gzungs sngags zhes bya ste/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ rtsa dur ba brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ gang ci byed kyang rung ste/ lha rnams kyis gzhig par mi
61b3(rgyud): nus so// dkyil 'khor zlum por byas te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad bor nas/ gang du brjod pa der 'byung pos gnod pa byed mi nus// byang stem byed par
61b4(rgyud): yang mi nus// de nas de'i tshe/ 'khor de dag thams cad kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad do// tad+ya thA/ sarba bA na/ na/ sarba b.rAn ni rdzi ta tri skan dan tsa pa na/ na ta man pa nA gas
61b5(rgyud): ra dad tsa tsa pa ba/ tsad mi ma/ b+has+thi mi/ daN+Da ka ra Na ha ra/ su ba ra/ de ba ma ra swAhA/ sa ba ba/ paR+Sha kA ra Na swA hA/ 'khor thams cad kyis bshad pa'i gzungs sngags 'di/ lan
61b6(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas/ skud pa de bsregs na khyim der byang stems kyis mi tshugs la/ 'byung ba'i nad rnams kyang med par 'gyuraro// ta thA/ ra ta thA
61b7(rgyud): ka ra/ de ba ra pu dzi dza ri pu ku dzi ti pu swA hA// gzungs sngags 'di lkog ma na ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ g.yag rnga la mdud pa bdun bor te gdags par bya'o// tang thA/ sarba bud+yAd ma
61b8(rgyud): bi Sha ka ra ba ba ra tsa tsa ra sa sa ra swA hA// gzugs sngags 'di lus la nad byung ba thams cad la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ skud pa la mdud pa bdun bdun bor te btag so// de nas de'i tshe
62a1(rgyud): 'khor de dag thams cad kyis dbus me'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// gang gi tshe gzhon nu rdo rje sde yul skar sngo nas/ li yul du mchi ba de'i tshe
62a2(rgyud): gzungs sngags gang gis shul du dpa' bo'i las bgyid par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags bdag cag gis sprul bar 'tshalo// tadad+ya thA/ bu bu de de bi bi sa sa/ ban+d+ha ba ba ta/ pa pa ra ti ka ra
62a3(rgyud): swAhA/ tad+ya thA/ sha ra ka ra bA/ dzad tsha ba ra/ shad tra tra/ na dzi swAhA// gzungs sngags 'di 'gron du 'gro ba rnams kyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ khrus byas la lag par
62a4(rgyud): blugs nas lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ phyogs pa bzhir 'thor ram/ bdag nyid kyis 'thungs na/ de dal dgras gnod pa byed par mi nus te/ dpa' bo'i las kyang
62a5(rgyud): byed par 'gyuraro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rgyal ma tshan gyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ de bzhin du rna ma thos kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / kun tu rgyal dang / 
62a6(rgyud): 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag gis kyang gzhon nu rdo rje sA la ci nas dag rnams gnod pa byed mi nus par gzungs sngags 'di dag sbyin no// na mo badz+ra
62a7(rgyud): dzas+ya/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ trad+ya thA/ badz+ra bi bi bi bi ma ma sa ka/ su ma te/ ad dA re/ ad d+ha re/ ad dz+wa la/  drI shAn pa 6/ na mo bai shra ma Na s+ya/ na ma sany+tsa ya s+ya/ na mo ho ri ti ya ba sa pu tra/ 
62a8(rgyud): pa ri ba ra ya/ tad+ya thA/ sa sa sa sa/ hA hA hA hA/ pri ya pri ya pri ya pri ya/ pu tra pu tra pu tra/ ba ra data ka ra/ ts+tshin+da mA le bidi twe sha na ka ra swAhA// dbang phyug chen po dang / rnam thos kyi bu/ 
62b1(rgyud): dang kun tu rgyal ba dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa rnams kyis zungs sngags 'di bshad nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag sug las chen por bskos/ 
62b2(rgyud): ba'i gzungs sngags gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa de dag kyang bdag cag gis bshad par 'tshalo// lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od de dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde skar rdo'i rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i go char
62b3(rgyud): 'gyur ba gang lags pa des/ chad pas bcad par bgyi ba de yang / bdag cag gis bshad par bgyi'o// gang gi tshe dgra 'am/ su yang rung ba dag sdig pa'i las rtsom pa na/ gzungs
62b4(rgyud): sngags pa shad pa 'di gnyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ skud pa sngon po la mdud pa bdun bdun bor nas bsregs te/ sra rtsi pog gi bdug pas bsregs la// mi
62b5(rgyud): de'i ming nas brjod na gnod pa byed mi nuso// bdag cag gi sa yi dam dang por bcas pa bzhin du ste gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs
62b6(rgyud): bar ma bgyis na/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sku bslus par gyur cig ces byaso// de nas 'khor der ji snyed 'dus pa'i lha dang / klu dang / 
62b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// byang
62b8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du bdag cag thams cad kyis kyang / dam bcas te de ltar ma bgyis na/ bdag cag gis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
63a1(rgyud): 'das thams cad kyi sku bsdus par gyur cig/ bdag cag thams cad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha ci nas kyang / li yul gyi rgyal por 'gyur ba thams cad sems 'thun
63a2(rgyud): bas lhan cig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// gang gi tshe gdong dmar dang rgya 'thab par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ ci nas li yul 'jig par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe yul bzhan nas/ li yul
63a3(rgyud): du rab tu byung ba rnams 'ongs pa na/ der ci nas rim gro byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / yul gzhan nas der sems can bros pa de dag der gnas 'thob par 'gyur zhing gdong dmar gyis bsreg
63a4(rgyud): pa gang yin pa'i mchod rten chen po de dag dang / dge 'dun/ gyi kun dga' ra ba de dag 'chos pa'i grogs byed par 'gyur par bya ba'i phyir li yul gyi glung 'jal ba dang / rgya dang
63a5(rgyud): phan tshun du bag ma gtong ba dang / len par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde gnyis la
63a6(rgyud): li yul gtad nas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu rdo rje sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod li yul gyi rgyal po byed pa dang / lha mo dri mi med pa'i 'od kyis
63a7(rgyud): grogs byed par 'gyur gyis mdo 'di las ji skad bshad pa bzhin du khyod kyis thams cad kyis shig/ gang gi tshe khyod gser gyi rigs kyi yul du phyir log pa de'i tshe/ rgya'i
63a8(rgyud): dmag lo yul du 'ongs so zhes de skad thos pa dang / the tshom ma byed par/ li yul du song la der pho nya ba btang na/ der 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ li yul dang / gu zan gyi yul du
63b1(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyuraro// de la spring yig ni nga dang gnyen du byos la/ yul nga la byin cig ces springs shig/ de nas de'i tshe khyod ni li yul gyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// dbang po'i go cha ni skar rdzo
63b2(rgyud): rgyal po byed par 'gyur te/ de yang khyod ci nas li yul gyi rgyal por 'gyur ba'i grogs byed par 'gyuraro// skar rdo'i yul du gnod pa 'byung ba de'i tshe/ khyod kyis ci nas kyang gnod pa byed du ma
63b3(rgyud): gzhug shig/ dbang po'i go cha dang yang thog mar 'dum par gyis shig/ las 'di dag byed pa'i grogasu 'gyur ro// skar rdo ba ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyang grogs byed par 'gyur ro// 
63b4(rgyud): a ku na zhes bya ba dpa' bo zhig yod de/ de sngon ye shes grags pa zhes bya bar gyur pa na/ des dar ma tir zhe das bya ba'i gtsug lag khang byaso// de nas khyod kyis a
63b5(rgyud): kun tshol cig dang / yul gzung ba'i phyir grogs byed par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dang khyod sngon smon la ma lhan cig tu btab pa'i phyir te/ a kun zhes bya ba'i mi de
63b6(rgyud): ni sngon rgyal por gyur te/ mi rgod rnams kyis chung ma brkus te/ phyir ma rnyed pa yin no// khyod ni rgyal po'i blon po chen po yin te/ dge byed kyi bar gyur pa yin// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas ba
63b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu rdo rje sde la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu rdo rje sde khyod ni li yul 'khor du rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur te/ lo sum cu'i bar du
63b8(rgyud): rgyal srid 'dzin par 'gyur la/ dge bsnyen du gyur nas/ li yul gyi phyir lus yongasu gtong zhing / 'bras bu thob par 'gyuraro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha me dri ma med pa'i
64a1(rgyud): 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod li yul du rab nges zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe/ mdo 'di zung shig 'di la 'jug par gyis shig rgyas par gyis shig/ skar rdo'i yul du yang
64a2(rgyud): ming po la bskul cig dang / khyod kyi steng du 'od zer rnams gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis gzungs sngags rnams rtogs par gyur pa/ de'i tshe khyod la sangs rgyas bca
64a3(rgyud): ldan 'das nyid gsung bar 'gyur zhing / lha rnams kyang ci nas khyod kyi las byed nus par 'gyur bde lta bu rgyas par smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang
64a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nu sdug ji ltar bcom ldan 'a/ ngas rin chen snying po grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe 'o bu cag
64a5(rgyud): gnyis sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstan pa thob nas/ der da skad du phyogs bcu na sems can 'jigs shing / skrag ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gis skyabs byed par
64a6(rgyud): gyur cig/ de skad ces smon lam btab pa'i dus de dran par gyis la/ da nga'i li yul 'di dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde gtang ba 'di khyod kyis long shig/ de nas bca
64a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / mthu chen thob dang / sman gyi rgyal po dang / rab sbyin dbang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / 
64a8(rgyud): byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sngon 'di'i phun po dang / grogasu gyur pa dang / rtag tu 'grogs pa ni 'di dag yin te/ 
64b1(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi lha dang / dbang phyug gi lha dang / ljon shing gi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / snying rje'i dbang phyug dang / gzugs kyi dbang phyug dang / spong ba'i dbang phyug dang / 'od kyi dbang phyug dang / dri'i
64b2(rgyud): dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug dang / 'od gsal dang / rigs kyi dbang phyug rnamaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu
64b3(rgyud): bzang po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bos te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis nga'i theg pa chen po'i mdo 'di dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / 
64b4(rgyud): lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od yongasu zung shig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bos te/ 'di skad ces/ bka' stsal to// khyod rtag tu nga'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ba yin gyi/ 
64b5(rgyud): mdo 'di dang gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha me dri ma med pa'i 'od da la gtad ngo do// gnod sbyin dbang po rnam thos kyi bu dang / gnod sbyin kun tu rgyal dang / lta bu blo gros brtan pa dang / klu
64b6(rgyud): rgyal po ma dros pa dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang / lha'i pho brang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi/ lha'i rgyal po rnams dang / 'khor der 'dus pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer
64b7(rgyud): gtong ba de dag dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la mdo 'di dang / li yul dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad de/ yongs su
64b8(rgyud): gtad pa 'di dam pas yongasu gtad do// de nas yang dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ngas ji skad bshad pa dang / khyod kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du grogs gyis la/ ngas
65a1(rgyud): / dgongs pa kun thams cad nas/ thams cad du mthar phyin par gyis la/ ci nas log par mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig/ ngas bskal pa mang por 'khor ba na/ da/ nga'i/ 
65a2(rgyud): las shin tu mang po don dang ldan pa dag byas pa lta bu ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang ma byaso// nga'i li yul 'khor der sems can ngas yongasu smin par ma byas pa de gang
65a3(rgyud): yin pa de dag phyis/ l-i yul 'khor du gnas par gyur te/ nga'i chos kyis yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bas
65a4(rgyud): pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bos te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed thams cad la mdo 'di/ dang / li yul dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha me dri ma med pa'i
65a5(rgyud): 'od gtad do// gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha thams cad dang / 'khor thams cad la mdo 'di dang / 
65a6(rgyud): li yul dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha me dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du lha'i me tog gi char bab po/ lha rnams kyis lha'i rol mo'i sgra bsgrag
65a7(rgyud): so// lha'i rgyan gyi char yang bab bo// de bzhin du 'khor de dag thams cad kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la ji ltar 'os pa'i mchod pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byaso// sangs rgyas ba
65a8(rgyud): ldan 'das de dag gis kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'od zer shin tu mang po btang // mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang // sangs
65b1(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngo // de na gnas pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa dang
65b2(rgyud): mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ste/ 'khor thams cad dang / lha dang mi rnams gcig gis gcig mthong bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe dge slong kun dga' bo stan las langs
65b3(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pas/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ su la la mdo 'di klog pa dang / sems pa dang / nyan pa dang / 
65b4(rgyud): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du 'phel bar 'gyurang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
65b5(rgyud): zhing brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nang na skye bo ji snyed gnas pa rnams la sbyin pa byin pa bas ni/ su mdo 'di 'chang ba 'am/ khwa ton du byed pa 'am/ klog pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ches
65b6(rgyud): mang bar 'gyur ro// mdor na ji ltar 'bras bu gsum pa rtogs pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes nga smra'o// de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / 
65b7(rgyud): nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 'khor de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag 'khor 'di 'dus pa ji snyed mchis pa
65b8(rgyud): rnams gang du mdo 'di brjod pa der ma mchis sam/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od la gzungs sngags ma stsal tam/ dam bcas pa 'di bskyud par gyur na/ bdag
66a1(rgyud): / cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku bsdus par gyur cig/ mtshams ma mchis pa'i las bgyis pa'i ldog pa ji tsam mchis
66a2(rgyud): pa/ bdag cag gis bgyis par gyur cig/ de nas 'od zer de dag las tshig su brjod pa 'di skad ces 'byung ste/ gang na mdo 'di brjod pa der/ bdag cag 'ong ngo zhes sgra grags par gyur
66a3(rgyud): to// de nas kun dga' bo dang / 'khor de dag thams cad kyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bka' stsam
66a4(rgyud): pa/ mdo 'di'i ming ni/ chos kyi spyi bo zhes kyang bya// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi snying po zhes kyang bya/ dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa zhes kyang bya'o// 
66a5(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// ngas chos gang bshad pa de dag thams cad ma do 'di nyid kyi nang du 'dus// bcom ldan 'das kyis de
66a6(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / 'khor de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs
66a7(rgyud): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// theg pa chen po'i mdo// dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // lha mo dri ma
66a8(rgyud): med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa'i mdo 'di shin tu dag par yod pas yid ches kyi gnas so// gzhan 'khrugs chad spyod pa mang bar snang ste glegs bam mang du bltas so// 
66b1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya.a ba lo ki te shwa rA hA ya grI ba d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ha ya gri ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
66b2(rgyud): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ sarba sa te b+h+yaHsa nA ga ti ne/ na maHsar+b+ba/ 
66b3(rgyud): satwe b+h+yaHsa na a ba ha ri Ni/ na maHsar+b+ba satwa b+ha yot+ta ra NA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba b+ha ba pra sha ma na ka rA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba satwa bo d+he tsaM ki ta sa na ka rA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba ban+d+ha na/ ts+tshe da na ka rA ya/ nam/ 
66b4(rgyud): sar+b+ba duHkha pra mo k+Sha Na ka rA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba an+ta ka ra ba~M d+ha ma na ka rA ya/ na maHsar+b+ba bi dA rA dza ba sha prAp+ta ye/ ma hA yo gA/ yo gI shwa rA ya/ te s+ya na maHkr-i tA i
66b5(rgyud): dan Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa ra mu khod gI r+Na r-i Shi brid da de ba na ga/ yak+Sha rA k+Sha sa/ sha kra bah+ma/ lo ka pA la/ briSh+Ta/ ma he shwa ra/ nA ra ya Na/ skan+ta ku be ra/ a su ren+d+ha/ mA traM ga
66b6(rgyud): Na na maHkr-i tan/ badz+re khu ra sa hi ye/ ha ya grI ba brah+ma/ ba ra ma hr-i da ya/ mA brta yiSh+Ta yi/ a ba pra me yAr+tha sA d+ha kan/ a ba h+yan/ sar+b+ba b+hU tA nA/ sar+b+ba big+h+na/ biM nA ya kaM/ a mo g+he/ sar+b+ba k+ShaH
66b7(rgyud): NaM bi shA nany+tsu/ bi nA ya kaM/ tad+ya thA/ o ta ru la ta ru la/ bi ta ru la bi ta ru la/ sar+b+ba bi Sha g+hA ta ka/ sar+b+ba b+hA ta bi dra ba ka dz+wa li ta/ a na la/ bi s+phu lig/ aT+Ta ha saM/ ka sa ra/ a to ba/ bra bi ta ka ya/ 
66b8(rgyud): badz+ra/ khu ra nirga ti ta/ tsa li ta pA su d+yA ta la/ badz+rod shra si ta/ ha si ta ma ru tok+Sha ti/ pra sha man ka ra/ ba ra duSh+Ta big+h+nAn/ saM b+hak+Sha Na ka ra/ swa bid d+ho pa de sha ka ra/ pa ra ma shAn+ti ka ra/ bud+d+ha d+d+han+ta
67a1(rgyud): bo d+hA ya mi te/ b+ha ga bAn ha ya grI ba/ sar+b+ba bidI hr-i da ya/ mA brta yiSh+Ta mi/ khA da khA da/ ma hA ro dr-i/ man+dan/ rak+Sha rak+Sha/ Ad ma sa tsi tAn/ man tran/ sid+d+ha sid+d+ha/ sar+b+ba karmA/ 
67a2(rgyud): Shu me/ sid+d+hi/ de hi de hi/ A bi sha A bi sha/ pra bi sha pra bi shai/ sarba gra hu Shu a pre ti ha ta/ d+hu na d+hu ma bi d+hu na bi d+hu/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ sar+b+ba ba ro pa gra ma/ kr-i t+ya ka kho rdo/ du ya?/ 
67a3(rgyud): gi ta/ mu sha kha/ bi sha ka ra/ bi sha daMSh+Ta bi sha tsUr+Na yo a bi tsA ra bi sha ka ra Na/ sid+d+ha any+dza na/ tsak+Shar mo ha na/ tsit+ta bka she pa na ka ra/ ni t+ya/ a ba ra prek+Sha Na/ trA sa ya tra sa ya/ ma hA
67a4(rgyud): bo d+hi satwa/ rid d+h+ya d+hiSh+ThA ne na/ sar+b+ba b+ha ye b+h+yaHsatwA nA rak+Sha rak+Sha/ da ma ma bud+d+ha/ d+harma saM g+hA/ a nu dz+nyA taM/ me karma/ sh+tsi[:]g+h+raM ku ru ku ru phaT/ ha ya grI ba phaT/ badz+ra khu rA sa phaT/ badz+ra
67a5(rgyud): daMSh+To ta ka Ta bA ya b+he re bA ya phaT/ pa ra man+ta/ sha ma ka rA ya phaT/ pa ru duSh+Ta big+h+nAn/ baM bik+Sha Na ka rA ya phaT/ sar+b+ba gra ho ta sA da na ka rA ya phaT/ sar+b+ba gra hwe Sha a pra ti ha/ 
67a6(rgyud): ya phaT/ phaT la mu khA ya phaT/ ye ge tsi te/ ma ma a hi te shin/ ka ye kra mi ni/ man+t+ra yin+ta/ ya man+ti/ dza ba yan+ti/ dzu \u0f7fn+ti/ kA kho kurban+ti/ sarba nA b+ha mu khe na ba kr-i tA ya phaT/ na ma
67a7(rgyud): sar+b+ba duSh+Ta gra hod sA da nA ya/ ha ya grI bA ya/ sid d+hanA man+t+ra pa daHsAhA/ oM a ma tod b+ha bA ya hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM na mo ha ya swA hA/ oM na mo bi shra mur+Na ye swAhA/ na maHsar+b+ba satwa

70a1(rgyud): / nang la srad bu byas te/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad du mdud te/ sngags kyi snying po bris pa'i snod dang bcas pas bzlas pa tshul bzhin du byas la de'i rjes

72a8(rgyud): tsit+ta/ ma ti lam po dang / de hi me be ra na shaM khi ni swA hA/ bdag gis 'di nyid kyi sprul pa'i sku 'di nyid du mthong bar gyur cig/ stong pa nyid la bzod pa thob par gyur cig/ stong pa nyid kyi don
72b1(rgyud): mthong bar gyur cig/ stong pa nyid kyi don byed par gyur cig/ 'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa mchog thob pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// 
72b2(rgyud): dpal lha me sgra dbyangs la bstod pa/ lam gang gis na sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / rgyal ba sras bcas chos kyi bla mar gyur/ mkhyen pa'i rim par sa rnams bkod pa yi// shes rab kyil 'khor
72b3(rgyud): mang la skyabasu mchi// phyag 'tshal dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs can ma/ 'jig rten khams 'dir smra la dbang brnyes shes// drang srong rig gsum rig pa'i pha rol gshegs// / de ni spyod pa rgya chen
72b4(rgyud): rnams las byung // sems can don phyir phrin las che dan po'i khur// spro bar dka' ba kun kyang khyod kyi sa mdzad// sa dang pha rol phyin pa bcu spyad pas// 
72b5(rgyud): dge ba'i tshogs brtan yid bzhin las su bsgyur/ zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zla ba dri med rgyas/ thugs rje'i sman gyis 'gro ba'i mig 'byed pa// dus ring
72b6(rgyud): 'jig rten kun la bde bar gzigs// de la dbang po tshangs sogs shin tu 'dud// byams shing bzod ldan snying rje bskyed pa'i ma// lha mo mchog de 'gro kun skyong bar dgyes/ 
72b7(rgyud): thor tshugs ri bo rtse 'dra spobs pa 'phags// shes rab zab cing shes pa'i rten byed kyang // rig pa'i gnas la mnga' brnyes tshig gi bdag/ 'jig rten na yang lha yi ltar
72b8(rgyud): gyur la// sdug bsngal bsal bar rab brtson gnyen mchog pas// mu su tog ge ba rnams kun kyang mdud// yan lag rnam par 'byes shing gsungs snyan pa// ya
73a1(rgyud): tan dri med bsod nams 'bar bar bsgyings// rig pa mchog gi dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa// blo myur tshig 'chang spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig/ sems can kun la
73a2(rgyud): rtag tu phan sems pa// mi slu mchog khyod rnam grol sa la bzhugs// thugs dam brtan bcas bskul ba rnams la yang // dpal gyis dgongs shig don kun nye bar skongs// 
73a3(rgyud): 'di ltar 'jig rten dag na snang ba kun// sgra 'joms khyad par tshig gis don mtshon te// phan tshun shes shing yang dag brda sprod pa'ang // dbyangs can khyod kyi mthu ste bsam mi khyab/ 
73a4(rgyud): gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang brnyes pa// dam chi/ dag bden grub drang srong shes nyan can// lus sam sa ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang // yid 'ong smras kyang
73a5(rgyud): 'jig rten tshim par byed// byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir su dag mos// bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs gyur pa'i// lus dang ngag yid rnam dag mchog 'dod la/ 
73a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mas rtag tu don mchog stsol// bdag ni dpa' zhing byang chub lam brtson dang / lce yi dbang po dag cing tshig btsun la// rig pa'i gter ldan sprul thogs med dang / 
73a7(rgyud): bde gshegs spobs pa nye bar sgrub du gsol// rig pa'i yum gyi rang bzhin rtog las dben// snyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i shugs kyis bskyod// mkha' la sna tshogs rnam
73a8(rgyud): par dri 'dod ltar// mtshan nyid rtogs dka' yon tan gting mtha' med// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ grah+Na Ne/ na maHsa ra sa t+ye de bi sid dAnA man+ta bA da ta brah+ma nu man+t+ra swA hA// dpal lta
73b1(rgyud): mo drabyangs la bstod pa rdzog so// / 6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya shrI ma hA de bi byA ka ra Na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang / 
73b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste byang chub
73b3(rgyud): sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib
73b4(rgyud): pa thams cad rnam par sel po dang / byang chub sems dpa da' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang
73b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
73b6(rgyud): chen po 'jigs pa thams cad sel ba dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byed kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
73b7(rgyud): dpa' chen po bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi zla dang / 'jig rten 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
73b8(rgyud): chen po mu stegs kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub
74a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
74a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ lha mo chen mo dpal yang bcom ldan 'das kyi
74a3(rgyud): thad du song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
74a4(rgyud): la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug// de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgya stong du ma das rgyan cing / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dag gis yongasu
74a5(rgyud): bskor te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'dzin rten skyeb thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngagaso// lha mo chen mo dpal la gzigs nas/ tshangs pa chen po'i gsung
74a6(rgyud): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po 'am/ blon po 'am/ dge slong ngam
74a7(rgyud): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mo 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmang rigs gang la la lha mo tshan mo dpal gyi ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med
74a8(rgyud): par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa 'di 'chang na/ rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang / sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing
74b1(rgyud): chom rkun dang / g.yo can dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// 
74b2(rgyud): rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du yang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
74b3(rgyud): gsung 'di legs par bka' stsal pa legs so// legaso// legs te/ gang dag lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang / thos nas kyang sgrub par bgyid pa de dag gi yon
74b4(rgyud): tan dang / phan yon ni de dag legs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la
74b5(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed pa lags/ bco ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo chen mo dpal
74b6(rgyud): gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma rnyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ba na/ 
74b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag
74b8(rgyud): la yang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang / 'grub par byed da / 
75a1(rgyud): rtag tu rjes su 'bang ba yin te/ de dag ni 'dir lha mo dpal yang dag par rjod pa dang / sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang / nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang / lus
75a2(rgyud): thams cad dri ma med par byed pa dang / nor dang / 'bru rnams 'du zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang / dbul ba gcod par byed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
75a3(rgyud): yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs par byed pa dang / yams kyi nang dang gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'khrug pa
75a4(rgyud): dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub par byed pa'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal stug po la phyag 'tshal
75a5(rgyud): lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gse/ ra 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
75a6(rgyud): gang+ga'i mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad bkra shis kyi dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi me tog gzi brjid skar ma'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun
75a7(rgyud): tu snang ba g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
75a8(rgyud): pa chos kyi cho 'phrul rgyal mtshan shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od zhi ba'i sposte snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sems
75b1(rgyud): can gyi bsam bzhi par mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam rgya mtshos snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
75b2(rgyud): gshegs pa shin tu yongasu brjod pa mtshan gsol dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// 
75b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phags dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus grangs med pa la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal
75b4(rgyud): lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i gser mchog snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// / de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi yan lag thams cad kyi sgra
75b5(rgyud): dbyangs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga shegs pa shes rab sgron ma grangs med pa'i 'od kyitog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
75b6(rgyud): gshegs pa sred med kyi bu'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga lhun po'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal phyug 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa
75b7(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal por
75b8(rgyud): dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i sgron ma 'od bzang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshalo// 
76a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron ma'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs
76a2(rgyud): pa sprul pa'i 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po lta
76a3(rgyud): skyes pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro ri bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes pa 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// 
76a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam chen po'i shugs kyi dpal/ de la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin che na po'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dran
76a5(rgyud): pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gsheg pa dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang 'bru thams cad sdud pa'i
76a6(rgyud): dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin
76a7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror byas te/ bcang bar bya'o// bklags par bya'o// de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams shin tu mang du
76a8(rgyud): bskyed par 'gyur ro// lha mo chen mo dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan te/ lha mo chen mo dpal khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal chen
76b1(rgyud): ba ran ba chos rgyan pa zhes par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal nor bu rin po tsha las byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de
76b2(rgyud): yang lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyun par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa'i byang chub
76b3(rgyud): sems dpa' de dag kyang rang las 'od 'byung zhing che dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' las kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas
76b4(rgyud): kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang pad+ma'i snying po dag las skye bar dgyu ro zhes lung bstan to// de la ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med/ 
76b5(rgyud): ba lta bu zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rgyun chags bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dang phyug lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnam par nyon cig/ 'di lta
76b6(rgyud): ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ lha thams cad kyi ma/ de bzhin gshegs
76b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dpal// 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal dang tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang
76b8(rgyud): phyug chen po rnams kyi dpal/ lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ gnas thams cad yod pa'i dpal/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'
77a1(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ rigs sngags 'chang dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi dpal/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi pa
77a2(rgyud): lnga'i dpal/ gza' brgyad dang rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dpalo// e nyi ma'i bu 'am/ yum rig byed bzhi'i dpal bkra shis ma/ sems can gyi ma/ rnam par rgyal ma/ gang ga ma/ 
77a3(rgyud): mu stegs thams cad ma/ bkra shis thams cad ma/ dri ma med par byed pa'i dpal/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog ma/ rgyags byed ma/ zla ba'i dpal/ nyi ma'i dpal/ gza'
77a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi dpal/ seng ge la zhon ma/ pad+ma'i mchog 'bum gyis bkab ma/ pad+ma/ pad+ma las byung ma/ pad+ma la da gnas ma/ pad+ma 'dzin ma/ pad+ma dang ldan ma/ rin po che 'od
77a5(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng ba du ma dang ldan ma/ nor sprin ma/ dkar mo/ dkar mo chen mo/ lag dkar ma/ bkra shis thams cad 'dzin ma/ bsod nams thams cad bsags
77a6(rgyud): ba'i lus can ma/ shes nyen gyi bu mau/ lag pa 'bum ldan ma/ mig 'bum ldan ma// mgo 'bum ldan ma/ nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi cod pan dang ldan ma/ gzugs bzang ma/ kun gyi
77a7(rgyud): gzugs can ma/ grags ma/ shin tu grags ma/ zhi ma/ sprin 'dra ba'i sgra gtsang ma/ zla ba ltar mdzes ma/ dge ma/ dge byed ma/ sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ 'phags
77a8(rgyud): ba me tog gi dpal me tog gi dbang phyug ma/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad kyi dpal/ chu klung dang / mtshe thams cad kyi dpal/ chu dang rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/ mu stegs thaMd mngon du phyogs pa'i
77b1(rgyud): dpal sma dang / rtsa dang nags tshal dang / nor dang / 'bru thams cad kyi dpal/ gser sbyin ma/ zas dang skom sbyin ma/ 'od gsal ma/ snang ma/ lus gtsang ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham/ 
77b2(rgyud): cad kyi dbang bsgyur ma/ lha'i tshogs zad la mngon du phyogs ma'i dpal/ gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i dpal/ sbyin byed ma/ longs spyod ma/ gzi
77b3(rgyud): brjid ma/ gzi brjid ldan ma/ phun sum tshogs ma/ 'byor pa ma/ rnam par 'phel ma/ mthong ma/ chos kyi dpal ma/ khyab 'jug la rten ma/ ku mu da la gnas ma/ gnod sbyin ma
77b4(rgyud): bzod sbyin ma/ mthu rtsal gyi gnas ma dag byed dang ba kra shis thams cad kyi lag ldan ma/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad 'jig byed ma/ bsod nams thams cad sdud
77b5(rgyud): dpalachos thams cad dang rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal// gas sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / 
77b6(rgyud): sha za dang / grul bum dang / lta 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ lha'i gnas dang / lha thams cad kyi dpal/ bzlas brjod dang / bzlas brjod du bya ba dang / sbyin sreg dang / sasprin bsreg
77b7(rgyud): du bya ba dang / bkra shis thams cad kyi dpal/ 'od ldan ma/ mchog dga' ma/ skal pas 'gyur ma/ drang srong thams cad dga' bar brjod pa'i dpal/ bud med thams cad kyi gnas kun gyi gotso mo dpa
77b8(rgyud): gyi mchog/ mi 'am ci mo thams cad dang / lha ma yin mo thams cad kyi mchog/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i gnas na 'dug ma/ yid 'ong ma/ sim byed ma/ lus ngan la sdug ma/ chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal/ oM/ 
78a1(rgyud): sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par gzigs shing sgrol cig/ thar par mdzod cig/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur par mdzod cig swAhA/ oM
78a2(rgyud): gang ga sarba tiR+Sha mu khe swA hA/ oM sarba bi tre swA hA/ sarba mo ga la d+ha ra Ni swA hA/ tsa tu be da sarba nak+Sha tra/ grA hA ga/ nA hA ga/ nA d+ha mar+d+ha ye swAhA/ brah+ma ya swA hA/ biSh+Ta ye swA hA/ ru drA ya
78a3(rgyud): swAsAhA/ bi shra mu khA ya sA hA/ oM gr-i ni gIn sarba kAr+ya sA d+ha ni/ si ni sa~M ni/ sA bA hA/ de ba hUM/ bai shra ma NA ya swA hA/ su bar+Na/ d+ha na d+he n+ya/ A kaR+Sha N+yai swAhU~M/ sarba pur+g+haM swA hUM/ shrI hi ba te A kaR+Sha N+yai swA hA/ 
78a4(rgyud): sarba pA pa ne sha myaM swAhA/ sarba a lak+Shi pra sha ma n+ye swAhA/  sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ye swAhA/ sarba de ba ta a b+hi mu kha shri ye a yur ba la baR+Sha ke re yai swA hA/ sarba bti tA maM ga la haste
78a5(rgyud): ya swAhA/ saM ga ba ha na naM swA hA/ pad+ma sa~M b+hU ta ye swAhA/ sa/ rba kr-i ti ka kho rje bi nA sha ne swAhA// 'jigs pa med ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ gang la la lha mo chen mo
78a6(rgyud): dpal gyi ming / nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ bsod nams thams cad sdud par byed pa/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa/ dpa
78a7(rgyud): dang / bde ba dang / skal pa bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog par byed pa des nang bar langs te gtsang bar byas la/ sang
78a8(rgyud): rgyas thaMd la me tog dang 'dug pa gsol nas/ lha mo chen mo dpal la yang tsan dan gyi bdug pa phul te/ bklags na des dpal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ bde ba dang / yid bde/ 
78b1(rgyud): dang / yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyang srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur/ de'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis
78b2(rgyud): de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lha mtshan mo dpal de dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang
78b3(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa rdzogs so// 
78b4(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA shra yA/ sUt+ma/ bod skad du/ 'gas pa dupal chen mo'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sa dmas dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
78b5(rgyud): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na bzhug so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan
78b6(rgyud): 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom
78b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po 'od/ dge slong ngam
78b8(rgyud): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma 'am/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste/ gang gis shes pa dang / gang la la 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dri
79a1(rgyud): ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa de ni dbul bor te phyug por 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis de ltar gyur cig ces kun nas gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
79a2(rgyud): kyis dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste/ dpal ldan ma/ bkra shis ma/ pad+ma'i phreng ba can/ nor gyi bdag mo/ dkar mo/ grags pa chen mo/ pad+ma'i sman/ 'od
79a3(rgyud): chen mo/ byed pa mo/ zas sprin ma/ rin po che rab tu sbyin ma/ dpal chen mo/ s+yAd ya the dan/ dzi ni/ g+h+ri NaM/ sarba ar+tha sA dA ni/ sha shi ni/ a lak+Shi Ni/ me nA sha yo/ sid dAn+ta
79a4(rgyud): me man+ta pa dAHswA hA/ oM b+h+r-i ku Ti pa ra ma su b+ha ge swA hA/ 8/ lan gsum du brjod par bya ste/ gang la la dus gsum du 'don pa de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad 'jig par
79a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// skal pa bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 2/ byor pa zad mi shes par 'gyur ro// mi dang phrad du'/ gro ba'i tshe bklags nas phrad pa byas na mi des de la bu'i 'du shes
79a6(rgyud): skyed par 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur la ji skad bsgo ba bzhin byed do// rtag tu rgyan mi 'chad par bklags na tshangs pa bram zes drag shul gyi las byas kyang mi tshags par 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas mang
79a7(rgyud): po la bsnyen bkur byas par yang 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// byang chub sems dpa' 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das
79a8(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de// 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen
79b1(rgyud): gyi mo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// dpal gyi lha mo mtshan bcu gnyis pa// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa
79b2(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug li phyag 'tshal lo// phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// dpal lha mo chen mo la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
79b3(rgyud): 'das bde ba can gyi 'jig rten na bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
79b4(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal lha mo chen mo yang bcom ldan 'das
79b5(rgyud): ga la ba der song ste/ drung du phyin nas/ bcom lnga/ na 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
79b6(rgyud): kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge
79b7(rgyud): bsnyen ma 'am/ sems can gang su yang rung bas dpal chen mo 'di'i ming bcu gnyis shes te 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / sgrub par byed pa dang / brjod par byed na de dbul po spangs nas phyag
79b8(rgyud): po chen por 'gyuraro// de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smraso// dpal lha mo chen mo'i ming bcu gnyis 'di lta ste/ bkra shis ma/ dpal ldan
80a1(rgyud): ma pad+ma'i phreng thogs ma/ nor bdag ma/ dkar sham ma/ grags chen ma/ pad+ma spun mnga'am/ 'od chen ma/ byed pa mo/ zas sbyin ma/ rin chen 'od ldan ma/ dpal chen
80a2(rgyud): mo ma/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// dpal chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ ji lta ste/ dzi na/ g+h+r-i ni/ dgos
80a3(rgyud): pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad ma/ si mi si mi/ ni mi ni mi/ bdag gi mi shes pa thams cad gsal bar mdzod cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub
80a4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o// / dpal gyi lha me'i mtshan bcu gnyis rdzogaso// 
80a5(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba bran+d+ha ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la bab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba kar+m+ma A ba ra Na
80a6(rgyud): sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA/ 
80a7(rgyud): ya e ga~M kai na~M ka ka ni/ res nir can/ tro troT ni/ trA sa ni trAs ni/ pra ti tan pra ti ta na/ sarba karma pa ra ba rA Ni me swAhUM/ gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ rtag tu
80a8(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na mtshams med pa lnga yang byang bar 'gyur ro// lan
80b1(rgyud): gcig bzlas brjod byas na ltos ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa rnams med par 'gyur ro// lus la 'chang ngam/ glegs bam la bris nas mgul du thogs te 'chang na dus ma yin par 'chi ba
80b2(rgyud): rnams gtan du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gang zhig snying rjes non te ri dgas dang / bya dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rung ste/ 'chi ba'i rna khung du brjod na de ngan song du 'gro bar mi
80b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// yang na shi ste dus las 'das na shi 'phos pa'i ming nas smos te de'i phyir byams pa dang snying rjes lan brgya'am/ stong ngam/ 'bum brjod na de sems can dmyal bar skyes su
80b4(rgyud): zin kyang de'i mdo la thar par 'gyur ro// sa 'am/ til lam/ yungs kar ram/ chu gang yang rung ba la bzlas brjod byas te/ shi ba'i lus la gtor ram
80b5(rgyud): khrus byas nas de'i 'og tu 'chad pa'am/ yang na mchodarten gyi nang du bcug ste/ bzhag la/ rigs sngags kyang bris nas mgo la btags na/ de ngan song du skyes pa/ 
80b6(rgyud): yang zhag bdun gyis gdon mi za bar thar te/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yang na rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gis skye bar 'gyuraro// gang zhig zla ba nya ba'i tshe
80b7(rgyud): khrus byas la gtsang mar byas te/ dus gsum du gos brda zhing kha zas mi za ba'am/ yang na kha zas dkar bag bza' zhing / sku gdung dang mchod rten du gang gi ming dang ldan pas lan 'bum
80b8(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na/ de ngan song nas thar te gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i risu skyes nas sgrub pa po'i zad 'ongs te mchod par byed cing lus kyang ston la/ legs so zhes bya ba yang byin nas
81a1(rgyud): lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de'i ming bris la gzungs sngags bzlas brjod byed cing / mchod rten 'bum byas la/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang
81a2(rgyud): ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod nas rgya mtsho chen po dang / yang na chu klung du btang na des sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa nas thar par 'gyur ro// yang na de ltar mchod pa byas nas mjug
81a3(rgyud): tu lam gyi gzhi mdor mchod rten chen por byas te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod la// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la yang mchod ston gsol
81a4(rgyud): nas yon yang phul te legs par mchod nas che ge mo zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur cig/ 'di kho nas bde 'gro ma tho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig/ ces
81a5(rgyud): kyang shes par byas na/ de kho na bzhin du skyes nas lus kyang ston cing leg so zhes bya ba yang byin nas mi snang bar rgyu/ ra to// mtshams med pa lnga byed byed pa 'am/ dam pa'i
81a6(rgyud): chos spong ba 'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa btab pa yang rung ste 'chi khar rtsig pa la gzungs sngags 'di bris pa mthong na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par gyur na/ 'don pa dang bzlas brjod
81a7(rgyud): byas pa lta ci smos/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid byon nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu tshur nga'i gan du shog ces kyang gsung bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spong ba
81a8(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bid+yA ut+ta ma ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig pa mchog gi rgyud chen po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
81b1(rgyud): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug so// de nas
81b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rigs pa bye ba phrag du mas bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bar snang las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
81b3(rgyud): mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rig pa bye ba du mas
81b4(rgyud): yongasu bskor nas 'khor de nyid du 'dug te/ bcom ldan 'dasakyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'a/ ngas lo lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug
81b5(rgyud): de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dang ldan 'byung po bye ba phrag du mas bskor nas 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs dang phyag na rdo rje la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
81b6(rgyud): gcig tu 'dug/ de nas gdol po'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// rgyal po chen po bzhi yang g.yog 'khor bye ba phrag du mas kun nas bskor te 'khor de nyid du 'dug nas/ 
81b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs
81b8(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad du ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du bdag gsang
82a1(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig 'chad par gnang ba mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje khyod ni shin tu ma rungs pa
82a2(rgyud): lag na rdo rje khyod ni shin tu brtsam pa med pa/ shin tu gtum pa yin na/ ji ltar sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsang sngags 'chang / lag na rdo rje khyod ni dam tshig shes pa yin la/ sems
82a3(rgyud): can gang dag dam tshig mi shes par brjod pa rnams ni rdo rjes mthar byed pa yin na/ khyod ji ltar gsang sngags 'chang / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das gang
82a4(rgyud): dag rig pa mchog 'di'i don 'don pa dang / 'chang ba dang / mchod pa bgyid pa de dag ni bdag gi dam tshig 'tshal ba la gas/ bdag gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa lags pas/ bcom
82a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bco/ ma ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi yi ge bzhi/ 
82a6(rgyud): pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa las mang po rab tu sgrub pa/ stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu ma mchis pa bstan pa thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'ad/ 
82a7(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po bshad par bgyi'o// kye kya lha yul dang / sa dang / chu la gnas pa'i 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams khyed yid rtse gcig tu gyis la nyon cig/ rdo rjes mgo bkas par gyur ta re/ 
82a8(rgyud): nas lag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa'i tshogs la bltas nas gsang sngags smras pa/ na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na ma sh+tsa NA badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/ ma hA shAkya saM bu d+hA ya/ birli/ kirI
82b1(rgyud): mo/ hirI/ bId+yA ta me ya rtsi ni mi li swA hA// de nas thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de 'dar yed yed nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
82b2(rgyud): cag la bskyab du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag la bskyab du gsol// de nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig/ 
82b3(rgyud): ma 'jigs shig/ rig pa'i rgyal po dran par gyis shig ces dbugs byung ngo // de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
82b4(rgyud): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'di lta bu'i ga dasang sngags kyi tshig dag 'chad pa ni ngo mtshar to// bco dam ldan 'das bdag cag ni rig pa'i rgyal po gang na gnas der
82b5(rgyud): mchod par 'tshalo// su klog pa dang / mchod par bgyi da pa dang / sgrub pa'i rigs sngags 'chang de'i brtson pa bskyed par bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de de
82b6(rgyud): bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i las ni 'di lags te/ srang bu'am/ thal ba 'am/ chu la lan cig brjod pas srung bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags bcad na mtshon rnon po la
82b7(rgyud): lan gnyis brjod de rtsa ku sha bcad do// yang na sa dra'o// de ltar na rigs sngags thams cad bcad par 'gyur ro// lan gsum brjod na rigs sngags tshang bar 'gyur te/ mar gyi ngo nag brgyad la
82b8(rgyud): 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la rigs sngags gang yi ge ma tshang ba 'am/ dran pa nyams pa de lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de rig pa'i mchog gi snying po dang lhan gcig tu lan
83a1(rgyud): gsum brjod na rmi lam du ston to// ci ste las bcad par gyur na rtsa ku shes bya ba par byaste rdzogs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan bzhi brjod na dge ba dang mi dge bston/ 
83a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du sbyor ba bgyis na las rnams su 'gyuraro// gdon tshar bcad na thal ba 'am/ chu 'am/ dur khrod kyi sol bas bsnun no// yang na gzugs bgyis te lkug
83a3(rgyud): mas gzhus na gtong bar 'gyur ro// yang na sa la gzugs bgyis te dur khrod kyi sol bas lag mthil la rdo rje bris te lag pas bkab na gtong bar 'gyur ro// skud pa la mdud pa bor ba rnams kyis
83a4(rgyud): rig sngags bcing ngo // mkha' 'gro ma rnams bcad par ba gyi na yungs kar dag la lan bdun bdun bsngags te bsnun na mkha' 'gro ma thams cad ma rungs par 'gyur ro// 
83a5(rgyud): dbab par bgyi na rna bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// yang / na tsan dan dmar pos dkyil 'khor byugs la rdo rje rtse lnga ba bris te gu gul gyis bdug pa dang / me tog rnams kyis
83a6(rgyud): dbab bo// phyag rgya gzhig na chu 'am/ thal lcag gam/ so phag gi dum bu rnams kyiso// dug las gson chu 'am/ rma ba'i mdongs sam/ chu dri'am/ me long gis so// mar
83a7(rgyud): gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du zhag gsum bsnyung bar byas la brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes dam pa stsol bar 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu
83a8(rgyud): dug gso ba la sogs pa dang / las gzhan rnams kyang bgyi'o// gal ta mkha' 'gro ma rnams shin tu bcad par 'tshal na/ de nas lag na rdo rje'i bdun du 'bras kyi zegs
83b1(rgyud): mas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na lag na rdo rjes ji skad bshad pa bzhin du tshe tsam thub par rig sngags thams cad ma rungs par 'gyur ro// seng ldeng gi rdo rje bgyis te/ rig sngags 'chang gi ming
83b2(rgyud): nas brjod la sa la lan cig btsugs na ba shig par 'gyur te/ de phyin chad rig sngags 'chang do'i gsang sngags rnams mi 'jug gi/ rig sngags bcad par bgyi 'tshal na/ rig
83b3(rgyud): sngags 'chang gi gzugs bgyis pa bcad na bcad pa bgyis par 'gyuraro// rig sngags ba shig par bgyid 'tshal bas rig sngags de rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig brjod na rig sngags
83b4(rgyud): thams cad bshig par 'gyur te las mi bgyid do// rig pa 'gugs par 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo nag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun
83b5(rgyud): du mchod par bgyis te/ rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na ri ga pa 'gugs te phyis rig pa sgrub bo// rig pa
83b6(rgyud): nyams par bgyis na bzlas brjod byas pa mchog ste/ che ge mo'i rig pa la gnod pa mdzod cig ces bgyis na rig pa las mi bgyid do// rig pa tshar bcad par bgyi na thal ba la
83b7(rgyud): gzugs bgyi ste/ rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig brjod la rkang pa g.yon pas kyang phyis na rig pa smad pa dang nyams par 'gyur te las mi bgyid// gal te rig sngags 'chang
83b8(rgyud): gzhig par 'tshal na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig sngags 'chang gi ming nas brjod de mar me'i snying po me lce dang bcas pa bdun sbyin sreg bgyis na rig sngags 'chang ba bshig par 'gyur te/ bsod nam/ 
84a1(rgyud): kyang 'jig go// srog kyang 'jig/ rig sngags 'chang de'i tshe ji tsam par gsang sngags rnams mi 'grub bo// slar gso bar bgyi na ma la ta'i me tog mar las spags pa'i
84a2(rgyud): sbyin sreg bgyi ba lan nyi shu rtsa gcig la mdun du sbyin sreg bgyi na rig pa 'grub bo// las 'di dag ni ma bsgrubs kyang bgyid do// ci ste bgyid 'tshal na ri la 'dzegs te kha zas 'o skyo 'thung
84a3(rgyud): zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur te de la bu ci bya zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das las thams cad mdzad du gsol
84a4(rgyud): zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang yang 'gug/ grog mkhar
84a5(rgyud): gyi sa las sbrul bgyis te sngags kyis btab na klu thams cad// mchi'o// dbang du yang 'gyur ro// gseg ma la la na bdun bsngags te mtsher bor na mtshe skam par 'gyur ro// 'bab
84a6(rgyud): chu chen por bar na 'bab chu chen po skam par 'gyur ro// gang du bor ba de skam par 'gyur ro// bdag gi rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad dang rig pa thams cad kyi mchog tu brjod pa'o// 
84a7(rgyud): gal te rig pa gzhan dag gi las mi 'tshal na yang sbyor ba 'dis/ rig pa thams cad sbyor bar bgyi'o// las thams cad bgyid do// las bgyid na rig pa'i rgyal po lhan cig lan gsum brjod la
84a8(rgyud): 'ga' zhig ma mchis na/ de'i 'gro dum du zin thig le'i snyi ma bzhin du 'gas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe gsang ba pa rnams kyi gsang sngags grub pa de'i tshe/ las thams cad tu rig pa'i mchog
84b1(rgyud): brjod bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag cig bsnyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la ba smad spu 'thun gyi mar sar blangs te/ mar sar des seng ljang gi mer lan brgyad stong
84b2(rgyud): sprin sreg bgyis na/ rig pa'i mchog rig pa sgrub pa rnams la dam pa stsol bar 'gyuraro// gang gi tshe pha rol 'bros par bgyid 'tshal na phub ma las lan brgya stong sprin bsreg bya'o// so phag gis
84b3(rgyud): kyang 'phangs na 'bros par 'gyuraro// mar gyi nyin zhag cig bsnyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arga'i zhugs bus la rtsa dur ba'i lo ma lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na taur cig rnyed par 'gyur/ 
84b4(rgyud): ro/ mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum bsnyung ba dbagyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du me tog ku mu da dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la spags pa khri me'i nang du sbyin
84b5(rgyud): sreg bgyis na dpal che bar 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho'i dbu ba dang / rgya spos dang / ldong ros rnams cha mnyams te rma bya'i 'khris pa dang / ril bu sran ma tsam du bgyis te lag na rdo rjes
84b6(rgyud): mdun du rig pa'i mchog lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis la sbrul gyis zin pa la chu las btang nas 'jog pos zin pa yang 'i tsha'o// srin bus zin pa dang / bas baljags dang / 'bras
84b7(rgyud): phreng bar gyur pa la chab bskol ba las btang // sbrum ma bu ma phyin pa la ni mar las btang na bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro// byis pa gdon gyis zin na bdug pas bdugs pas gtong bar
84b8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// bud med kyis nad la ni dar ba las btang ngo // phug tu 'jug na lus la bsku'o// sgrub pa na bdag la bdugs na log 'dren thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du/ 
85a1(rgyud): srad bu la rig pa'i mchog brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pa la btags nas gsul ngo bzhugs na pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i thal ba na/ 
85a2(rgyud): thal ba gtsang mas kham por bkang la rig pa mchog bzlas brjod bgyis na rkun po gang na 'dug pa der mchi'o// gang gis rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis pa de la dbang phyug chen po
85a3(rgyud): dang / dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs dang / bgegs dang log 'dren dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / srul po dang / mdza
