109b8(rgyud): ku'i sreg shing yungs kar gyi 'bru mar la smyugs la brgya stong skyon sreg bgyi'o// de nas lha rnams so so nas tshig tsong brgya byin gyi gan du mchi'o// brgya byin yang lha rnams dbugra 'byin te/ 
110a1(rgyud): grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ces lha rnams dbugs phyung nas rig sngags 'chang gi gan du mchi ste phyin pa dang / tshig 'di skad du kye ma'i rig sngags 'chang la dge sbyong gi tshul medo/ 
110a2(rgyud): zhes smras pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes gang bshad pa de dran par bgyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de thos nas shin tu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis rig
110a3(rgyud): sngags 'chang la rig pa stsol lo// de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gi rig pa mchog gis slar btang bar bgyi'o// rig pa des rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags
110a4(rgyud): 'chang bdun stong gi bdag por bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro// / lha rnams kyang g.yos par bgyid par 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin rnams kyang phung bar bgyid par 'tshal bas gang nas gnod
110a5(rgyud): sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo gnas pa der mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la mchis la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ byang/ chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la a pa marga'i yam sreg shing
110a6(rgyud): las lan brgya stong sproni sreg bgyi'o// de nas gnod sbyin de dag 'bros pa tshur sheg ces brjod na slar mchi'o// mchis nas kyang nga'i bsnyen bkur bgyis shig ces brjod do// gdugs
110a7(rgyud): gcig bzhin du ti nar bdun bdun stsal lo// gang du bskos pa de thams cad bgyid// dri za rnams lhung bar bgyid par 'tshal bas rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i klung gi ngos su yar gyi ngo ches brgyad
110a8(rgyud): la nyon zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ kham po dza'i shing gis zhugs bus la yungs kar mar dang bsres pas lan khrir sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas yi dgas kyi gzugs can gyi mi'iH
110b1(rgyud): mchi'o// mchis nas kyang rkang pa gnyis la phyag bgyid pa dang / bde bar gyur cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de nas mi des rkang pa gnyis la lig bu mig bzhag nas slar mchi'o// lig pu mig des
110b2(rgyud): mig bskus na dri za'i gzugasu 'gyur ro// rkang gis 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro// dri za rnams kyang srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par bgyid do// log 'dren/ 
110b3(rgyud): rnams kyang brlag par bgyid na sman a sa de ba dang / shing ba la kar ba sa'i tshig gu dang / ne'u le'i spu dang / sbrul kogs rjes pa dang / rdzas de dag gis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs la bdug par
110b4(rgyud): bgyi'o// rig pa yang lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyi'o// / de nas rmi lam du log 'dren rnams bred cing ci bya gtol med par mthong ngo // de'i nang nas mi cog 'di skad ces kyi
110b5(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang bdag cag la gnod pa ma mdzad par 'dri/ snoms shig ces smra'o// de nas nang bar ti nar cig/ stsol lo// sgrub pa'i dus na yang bdug pa 'di nyid kyis bdag
110b6(rgyud): la bdugs na log 'dren thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro// log 'dren gyi las bgyi na yang mar gyi ngo zhag brgyud la nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis la bgyi'o// rdo rje'i rigs skrag par bgyi
110b7(rgyud): na lce 'bab pas bcag pa'i shing blangs la mar gyi ngo zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lce 'bab pas bcag pa'i shing gis zhugs bus la kham po dza'i yam sreg shing brgya
110b8(rgyud): stong sbyin sreg bgyis na/ rdo rje'i rigs thams cad skrag par 'gyur ro// ri'i dngos grub kyang stsol lo// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa la
111a1(rgyud): gnod pa bgyid na mar gyi po nag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te mtshan gcig mchis par mchis la ci nus kyis mchod de/ mtshan la khrag gis bslus la khros pa
111a2(rgyud): dang bcas pas lag pa gnyis kas 'khyud de/ rig pa lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na de na mtshan 'gul lo// skrag par 'gyur zhing rang gi cho ga rgyas pa rnams kyis dngos grub stsal to// 
111a3(rgyud): de ltar cho ga rgyas pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje la phur bus gdab na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du seng ldeng gi shing gis zhugs
111a4(rgyud): bus la kham po dza'i yam sreg shing brgya stong sbyin sreg brgya das na bsregs blugs gsum pa'i tshe 'dar ro// brgya des tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// sum brgyas skam par
111a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bzhi brgya pa'i tshe lag na rdo rje la phur bus bta/ par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje phur bus btab pas laHna rdo rje'i rigs thams cad dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab
111a6(rgyud): 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyang phur bus btab par 'gyuraro// brgya stong tshang pa'i tshe lag na rdo rje'i tshig nas mchi ste/ rig sngag nga 'dod ci sbyin ces brjod pa dang / 
111a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das cho ga rgyas pa dngos grub bdag la stsal du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o// de ltar gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang bar gyur to// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis myur bar lag
111a8(rgyud): na rdo rje'i gzugs 'o mas bkru bar bgyi'o// de nas mchis pa'i mar dang / gu gul gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas sos par 'gyu ro// lha la mchod pargya
111b1(rgyud): cher bgyis la shugs ldan mas slar gshegs su gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang la gal te dngos grub tu ma gyur na rig sngags 'chang des las
111b2(rgyud): bdag gir bya ba yin par dmigs par bgyi'o// lan gnyis su yang sgrub par bgyi'o// ma grub na yang las bdag gir bya ba yin par dmigs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
111b3(rgyud): ba ci'i phyir de skad smra/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das pa 'gums pa dang / ma 'gums pa dang / tshangs pa la gnod pa bgyid pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis/ mtshams ma mchis
111b4(rgyud): pa lnga dang ldan pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag 'di skad ces brtson 'grus pa rtsams la bsgrub par bya'o// zhes mchi'o// lan bdun du
111b5(rgyud): yang sgrub pa la 'jug par bgyi'o// gal te ma grub na la sa 'di brtsam par bgyi ste/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung bar bgyis la dur khrod kyi shing gis
111b6(rgyud): zhugs bus te/ seng ldeng gi yam sreg gi shing bdag gi khrag la byugs la lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o// gal te ma mchis na rang gi shas la ni brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na mchi bar
111b7(rgyud): bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi dngos grub kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// las 'di ni mchog tu mi bzad pa lags te/ rig sngags 'chang des mi bzod pa'i las 'di thog mar
111b8(rgyud): mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'gal bar bgyi ba ma lags pa lta bu ste/ gal te rig sngags 'chang gis
112a1(rgyud): las thog mar brtsams te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag la gnod pa bgyid de de kho na nyid kyang mi mthong la bdag la gnod pa bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag la
112a2(rgyud): gnod pa bgyid na lha thams cad la gnod pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin thams cad la yang gnod pa bgyis par 'gyur te/ de dag rig sngags 'chang de la glags tshol zhing mchis par
112a3(rgyud): 'gyur/ gal te mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang ldan pa'i rig sngags 'chang zhig rig pa'i rgyal po sgrub na sgrub pa bdun pa la dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o// gal te ma su la na/ de bzhin
112a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad 'khus par 'gyur ro// bcom lnga na 'das gzhan yang gang gis reg sngags 'chang rnams/ kyi dngos grub du 'gyur ba'i rdzas rnams mi 'phrogs par brjod
112a5(rgyud): pabapar bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po spros shig/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang gis lig bu mig dang ldong ros la sogs pa sgrub na thog mar 'o mas bkru bar
112a6(rgyud): bgyi ste/ bkrus pas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// dngos grub tu gyur pa'i rdzas rnams kyang rig sngags 'chang gi bla ma dang / bdag dang grogs rnams la cha gsum du bgo bar bgyi'o// ral
112a7(rgyud): gri dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung rtse gsum pa zhig grub la/ stor na yid kyis 'di snyam du sems can gang bsod nams chung ba de'i stor grang snyam du bsams la rig sngags 'chang des sprin
112a8(rgyud): sreg bgyi'o// yang na lag pa bkan te mnan no// gal te shin tu gnod pa bgyis na rig sngags 'chang des 'di skad du rdzas 'di ni lag na rdo rje'i yin no zhes brjod par bgyi'o// bcom
112b1(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag gi mang pos nas yid kyis kyang lakhrubs sems pa ni lnga dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge slong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang
112b2(rgyud): pa'i 'jig rtenan ma mthong ngo // de nas thams cad dang bcas pa'i 'khar ngas byang chub sems dpa' chen po legs lagaso// stobs dang pha rol gnan pa dpag tu med pa khyod sing ge'i sgra
112b3(rgyud): 'di lta bu 'byin pa legaso zhes te legs zhes bya ba byin no// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi nye ba'i snying po lags te/ 'di lan gcig brjod pas/ tshig chen po rgyas pa brgyad
112b4(rgyud): brjod par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje de de bzhin te/ da de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dun sgrub pa dang / gnang ba bgyid na yid kyis bzlas / 
112b5(rgyud): bgyi'o// ci ste rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub paratshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des thog ma rig sngags / la ni brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bgyi'o// nye ba'i snying du
112b6(rgyud): yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags sgrub par bgyi'o// gal te rig sngags ma grub na de nyid du mchis la du ba mchis pa'i me mangs
112b7(rgyud): tu ske tshe las lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na rig pa de nyams par gyur nas de'i mdun du mchi ste dngos grub tu stsol to// de nyid du mchis la rig sngags 'chang gis yang rig pa bsgrubs na myur du
112b8(rgyud): 'grub bo// gsang sngag so thams cad kyi las kyang 'dis 'grub pa lags// spos rnams kyi lag ni rdo rje'i gzugs bgyis la 'dugs bdun dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjid
113a1(rgyud): bgyis la mar gyi po nag bcu bzhi pa la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ dpag tu ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis na gnod sbyin mo mchi bar 'gyur te/ rdo rje banang
113a2(rgyud): mas smar stsal bar bgyi'o// gang gi tshe ngas che ge mo zhes bya ba la rgyob shig rgyob shig/ bsregs shig bsregs shig/ zung shig/ myos par gyis shig/ ma rungs par gyis shig
113a3(rgyud): ces bsgo ba thams cad la gnod par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das dran pa tsam gyis kyang thams cad gyis shig ces bsgo bar bgyi'o// nye ba'i snying po rdzogaso// / 
113a4(rgyud): nag mo drag mo'i las rnam lags te gsang sngar tha~Md gsang sbar ga/ nga lA mi bgyid pa de nag mo drag mo 'dis bkug na de las bgyid do// bkug kyang gal te ma grub na phye ma red lag
113a5(rgyud): na rdo rje'i mdun du rig sngags de lan bdun brjod la de'i 'og tu nag mo drag mo'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par ba gyi'o// de nas sngags de rmi lam du ston par bgyid// yi ge ma
113a6(rgyud): tshang ba dang / pur bu btab pas smra bar bgyid do// gal te yi ge ma tshang bar gyur na rig pa mchog gis tshang bar bgyid do// gal te phur bus btab par gyur rig pa mchog nyid kyis phur bus 'brung
113a7(rgyud): bar bgyid de/ phye ma red lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la sngags de rang gi khrag gis shing ta la'i lo ma la bris te/ rtswa ku sha las bgyis pa'i rdo rje las mngan sngags la bsnun na de nas
113a8(rgyud): phur bu 'byin par 'gyuraro// gdon dgug na me tog gis bgyi'o// gdon rengs par bgyid na lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o// gdon spong bar bgyi na bdug pas
113b1(rgyud): bgyi'o// gdon dbab na rna bar bzlas brjod bgyis bso// gdon gtong bar 'dod na sha ka ra'i chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na gtong ngo // tsan dan dmar po las rdo rje bgyis la mar gyi ngo// 
113b2(rgyud): zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ba lang gi shas bdug par bgyi'o// rig pa yang lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na pha rol brjed byed kyis zin par
113b3(rgyud): bgyid do// rdo rje 'o mas bkrus la rig pa yang lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na thar par bgyis par 'gyuraro// rdo rje de nyid la sha chen pos bdugs la rig pa yang lan brgya stong bzlas brjod
113b4(rgyud): bgyis na 'gum par bgyid do// tshes grangs dang skar ma bdam mi 'tshal/ bsnyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal te/ 2dadi la ni khra bo nyid do// dgra bsad par 'tshal bas gos rlon
113b5(rgyud): pa bgos la kha gdugs bltas te dgra'i srog bskams kyi bar du gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o// rdo rje mas bkrus la rig pa yang lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis/ 
113b6(rgyud): snga 'kho bzhin 'gyur ro// gal te nag mo drag mo sgrub par 'tshal na thog ma nyid du za su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung ba
113b7(rgyud): ma gos pa'i ras la sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gser mdog lta bu bri bar bgyi'o// de'i g.yon rol du nag mo drag mo bri bar bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum bsnyung ba
113b8(rgyud): bgyis te mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la nag mo drag mo mchi bar 'gyur gyi bar du rig pa bzlas brjod bgyi'o// mchis pa dang rig pa mchog gis mchod yon dbul lo// de nas de rig sngags
114a1(rgyud): 'dzin ci sbyin par bya zhes mchi ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rgyal mo bgyid du stsol cig ces brjod na de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// nag
114a2(rgyud): mo drag mo'i cho ga rdzogs so// / rgyal ba ldan ma'i las rnams lags te/ lha thams cad dgug na lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o// dud 'gro'o skye
114a3(rgyud): gnasu gtogs pa thams cad dgug na yid kyis bgyi'o// bud med dbang du bgyid na yar gyi ngo tshas brgyad nas brtsams te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bdugs bdun dus gsum du du ba ma mchis
114a4(rgyud): pa'i me mngag la na le sham gyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro// dbab par bgyi dad na chab 'am/ bye'u rug pa'i 'o mas bgyi'o// gdon bcing
114a5(rgyud): ngam bskyod par bgyi na gu gul gyis bgyi'o// dur khro da kyi thal ba la gzugs bgyis la lan gsum bzlas brjod byas pas gdon gyis gtong bar bgyid// dur khrod
114a6(rgyud): kyi sol ba las gdon gyi gzugs bgyis la mtshon rnon pos bcad na bcad par gyur te gtong // dug las gsol na yal gas bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la dur khrod du dur khrod kyi thal
114a7(rgyud): ba la gzugs bgyis la/ bzlas brjod lan brgya stong bgyis pa'i seng ldeng gi phur bus snying khar btsugs na glaHra thabs drag pos btab par 'gyur ro// phyung na sos par 'gyur ro// 
114a8(rgyud): yar gyi ngo ches bdun la nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bya rog ma langs kyi skang du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na tir gcig stsol to// sgrub
114b1(rgyud): pa bgyi na ma gos pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gser gyi mdog can bri bar bgyi'o// de'i g.yon rol tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar
114b2(rgyud): bgyi'o// de'i g.yas rol tu 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bri bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni 'dam bu 'da' rgyu'i kha dog ltar dkar ba'o// lag na rdo rje ni sngo
114b3(rgyud): bsangs te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// lag na rdo rje g.yas rol du ni rgyal ba ldan mo sngo bsangs la de yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de'i 'og rol tu ni sgrub pa po lag na/ 
114b4(rgyud): pog por thogs par bri'o// de nas zhag gsum bsnyur dab bgyis te/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la/ gu gul gyis bdun
114b5(rgyud): pa sreg cing ri me'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du zhugs bus la ka ra bi ra'i me tog zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la bsnyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas me thab nas ka/ 
114b6(rgyud): ra bi ra'i me tog pad+ma'i tshad tsam du 'byung ngo // ka ra bi ra'i pad+ma'i dbus nas ka ra bi ra 'dra ba'i ldong ros 'byung ste/ rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyid bzhin du ngo blang bar bgyi'o// blangs pa tsam gyis
114b7(rgyud): gdugs shar ba'i mdog lta bu dang / skra lcang lo 'khyil ba dang / lo bcu drug lon pa'i lus lta bur 'gyur/ lo brgyad khri thub par 'gyur/ na mkha' la mchi ba dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / kha/ 
114b8(rgyud): zas ci 'tshal ba rnams 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags par 'gyuraro// bdag 'gum pa'i dus 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// gal te slad kyis kyang brtson 'grus
115a1(rgyud): bskyed na tshe de'i nyis 'gyur thub par 'gyuraro// yar gyi ngo zla ba nya la nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te/ mchod pa bgyis la me rtag dri zhim po las brgya stong phul na kar sha pa na rdza
115a2(rgyud): stsol to// dgra bslang bar 'tshal na yar gyi ngo ches gcig la dur khrod kyi gnas su zhugs bus la dur khrod kyi thal bas sbyin sreg bgyis na bskrad bar 'gyur// mar gyi po nag bcu bzhi la nyin
115a3(rgyud): zhag gcig bsnyung bar bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bri yang ku'i shing gis zhugs bus la beng ka ta'i yam sreg shing brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na nor stsol to// dpal che bar bgyi na lag na rnga
115a4(rgyud): rje'i mdun du til gyis lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyi'o// / dbye bar bgyen yar gyi ngotshes lnga la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mon sran gre'u las
115a5(rgyud): lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbye ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// tshos grangs dang skar ma bdam mi 'tshal/ bsnyung ba/ bgyi mi 'tshal te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du gdugs bdun
115a6(rgyud): dus gsum du ru ra brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na phyugs chung rnyed do// bud med dbang du bgyi na gdugs bdun dus gsum du mon sran gre'u las sbyin sreg bgyi'o// skyes pa dbang du bgyi na ma
115a7(rgyud): gyi po nag bcu bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la til las lan brgya stong bgyis na skyes pa dbang du 'gyur ro// rA dzA ma ta ba shI ka ra mi shuk+ka pra ti ba dA maM b+he badz+ra pA
115a8(rgyud): Nerak+Sha ta ar+tha a ste ga nim pa dz+wa lu shi ta sa ra sha pa na aSh+Ta sa ha sra dzu cu yang ya bad a sta mo ti ba sha/ rgyal ba ldan pa'i tshi ga rdzogaso// / rdo rje lcags skrag gi las rnam
115b1(rgyud): rig sngags bcing na srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te mdud pa dor ro// yungs kar gyis ni zhugs kyi ra bar 'gyur ro// chab kyis ni yul gru chen por 'gyur ro// thal bas
115b2(rgyud): ni rdo rje ra bar 'gyuraro// bcing ba thams cad rdo rje lcags sgrog 'di nyid sbyar bar bgyi'o// gang dag bdag gi rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa la dam tshig mthong nas 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las
115b3(rgyud): 'das pa'i rig sngags sgrub pa de dag la gang dag bgegs bgyid dam rdzas 'phrog pa de dag ni dam tshig ma 'tshal cing rigs la 'khu ba lags te/ de dag ma rung bar bgyi ba'i slad du las 'di
115b4(rgyud): brtsam par bgyi'o// tsan dan dmar po las lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bgyis te mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du seng ldeng
115b5(rgyud): gi shing gis zhugs bus la/ sha chen po bsregs blugs/ lan bdun sbyin sreg bgyis te/ de'i 'og tu 'di skadaces lha 'am/ gnod sbyin nem/ grub pa 'am/ rig sngag
115b6(rgyud): 'chang ngam/ log 'dren nam/ log 'dren g.yog 'khor ram/ grul bum 'am/ 'byung po 'am/ sha za 'am/ gang gis bdag gi rdzas ji ltar khyer ba des slar byin cig ces brjod par bgyi
115b7(rgyud): de skad thos nas gal te des stsal na ni cang mi bgyi'o// gal te ma stsa la na yang 'di skad skrag par bgyi ste/ gang gis bdag gi rdzas khyer ba des slar byin cig ces bgyi'o// ci ste ma stsal na/ 
115b8(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i rigs las phyi rol pa lag na rdo rje'i rigs la 'khu ba lags pas bya gag gi rtug pa blangs la yang lan gsum brjod par bgyi'o// de ltar bgyis kyang ma sul na bya gag
116a1(rgyud): gi rtug pa lag na rdo rje la bdug cing rig sngags kyang lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas lag na rdo rje'i rigs la 'khu ba des kyi hud kyi hud ces mchil tshig cings phyogs
116a2(rgyud): der lhung // mig kyang 'jar ro// 'gum par yang 'gyur ro// de'i rigs rabs chad par 'gyuraro// nor ni slar khugs par 'gyur ro// bsad par ni mi bgyi'o// gdon gyi las rnams kyang / 
116a3(rgyud): bgyi ste/ sa zin pa 'am ma zin pa yang rung ste yid kyis dbab par bgyi'o// bye'u rug po'i lo ma 'am/ sra rtsi bog gam/ chab kyis dug las gso bar bgyi'o// bdag gso zhing mdzen
116a4(rgyud): ma mchis par bgyin dog sa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pa gyis la bslu bar bgyi'o// nad krita ta si ma mchis dbar bgyi na srad bu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pakyi/ 
116a5(rgyud): la gang na nad kri ta si mchis pa der bcing bar bgyi'o// mar gyi zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bil ba'i shing gis zhugs bus la
116a6(rgyud): bil ba'i yam sreg shing khri sbyin sreg bgyis na longs spyod dag stsol lo// yar gyi ngo nya la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du a bi marA'i yam sreg shing khri rig pa
116a7(rgyud): mchog dang ldan cig pas sbyin sreg bgyis na rdo rje lugs sgrog mthong zhing gang blangs pa de stsol// rdo rje lcags sgrog gi cho ga rdzogaso// / rdo rje ser mo'i las rnams lags te/ gdan/ 
116a8(rgyud): babs pa gtong bar bgyi ni chab kyis bgyi'o// 'dar bar bgyin mdzub mo la lan bdun bzlas brjod pagyis te bstan na 'ang // gdon rnam par gzhom na yid kyis lan bdun bzlas brjod bkyil// 
116b1(rgyud): chab kyis ni rengs par bgyid do// rig pas bcings pa las dgrol na rdo rje sor mo'i sngags lan bdun brjod de/ song shig song shig ces brjod na grol bar 'gyur ro// bcing ba dgrol na lan 'bum bzla
116b2(rgyud): brjod bgyis 'grol lo// rkang rdul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas thig le bgyis na gang bsams pa de rnyed do// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te
116b3(rgyud): n+ya gro gcig pu mchis par mchis la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ n+ya gro da'i drung du mchis la/ sh+le shwe ta ka'i lo ma dag gi steng du rtsa dur ba'i lo ma bzhag ste/ 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi
116b4(rgyud): 'bar nas mgo bor bzhag na de me tog gi phreng bar 'gyur ro// / des mgo la bcings na dpag tshad stong du gyen du'adapag go/ lo khri nyis stong thu'o// zla ba spyang kis
116b5(rgyud): zin pa'i tshe zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ras dkar po bzhag la 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na blangs pa tsam gyis gdugs shar ba lta bu'i
116b6(rgyud): mdog can du 'gyur zhing lo nye stong thub par 'gyur ro// rdo rje ser mo'i cho ga rdzog so// / shugs ldan ma'i las rnams lags te/ gdon char bcad na dur khrod kyi sol/ 
116b7(rgyud): bas gzugs bris la/ lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i lcug mas gzhus na gdon gyis gtong ngo // skra las bgyis pa'i srad bu gtun shing gis brdungs na gdon du zhing gtong ngo // 
116b8(rgyud): gzegs ma las sbyin sreg bgyis na gdon gyi yan lag 'tshig par 'gyur ro// ba lang gi lci ba las gzugs bgyis la/ lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thur mas mig phyung
117a1(rgyud): zhar bar 'gyur ro// lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i bseg mas shing ljon pa la bsnun na 'pho bar 'gyur ro// dbab na me tog gis bgyi'o// dgrol na yid kyiso// 
117a2(rgyud): 'di dag la sogs pa ni gdon gyi las rnams lagaso// srung ba ni lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thal bas bgyi'o// yul gra srung ba ni lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i
117a3(rgyud): chab kyis bgyi'o// bskrad pa ni yungs kar gyis bgyi'o// nang par langs te shugs ldan ma'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/ nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// bud med dpang
117a4(rgyud): du bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas brtsams te/ dgung bdu na dus gsum du lung thang gi shing gis zhugs bus la 8/ til gyi bsreg skugs lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg
117a5(rgyud): bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro// rA dzA na ba ma shi ka tu ka ma kr-i/ Sh+Ta sra a b+ha mi ma a ho ra tro shi te na badz+ra pA Nir g+hu/ ta ti la ka sh+le raka naM pra dzA l+ya ru d+hi ra ak+Sha nai ri dza ka na a
117a6(rgyud): aSh+Ta sa ha sre dzu hU ya ba sho b+ha ba ti/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu ngogs gnyi ga'i sa blangs la za ma tog bgyis te za ma tog der log bu mig stsal la za ma tog kyang mi thod kha sbyar gyi nang du stsal te/ 
117a7(rgyud): mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas gung gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te mtshan gcig mchi par mchis la lce phyog su mchis te mi thod thogs la 'bar gyi bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas blangs te rig pa mchog
117a8(rgyud): gis srung ba bgyis te lig bu mig gcig la btabs te/ lig bu mig de 'o ma dang lhan cig 'tshal na 'tshal ba tsam gyis skra lcang lo khyil bar 'gyur/ mdog ut+pa la'i kha dog lta bur
117b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ mtshon gang dag 'phags pa de dag phye mar lhangs par 'gyur/ lo drug khri thub par 'gyur/ dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams grogs su 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo nag bcu
117b2(rgyud): bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la me tog ut+pa la zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la skyugs pa brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis/ 
117b3(rgyud): na rnyed do// 'byung po thams cad dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo zhag gsum du bsrung ba bgyis te/ dur khrod du mchis la pri yang ku'i shing gis zhugs bus te mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin
117b4(rgyud): bsreg bgyis na 'byung po thams cad mchi bar 'gyur te/ de dag la phyag brnyan gyis shig ces brjod na gang dang gang du bskos pa de dag thams cad bgyid do// yar gyi ngo
117b5(rgyud): tshes lnga la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du a ti muk+ta ki'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad phul na longs spyod rnams stsol te/ shugs ldan ma'i cho ga
117b6(rgyud): rdzog so// / rdo rje gdong gi las rnams lags te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i bum pas gdugs bdun khrus bgyis na sdig pa thams
117b7(rgyud): cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// byis pa gang dag gdon gyis zin te khrus bgyis na gtong bar 'gyur ro// gdon gyis zin pa rnams la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i
117b8(rgyud): bdug pas bdugs na gtong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag nam gru dang srul po dang gdon brnyan nas zin pa de dag tshen sna lnga'i skud pa la mdud pa bdun bor te/ lag pa la bcings nas
118a1(rgyud): gtong ngo // dug las gson yal gas bgyi'o// srin bu ti kas zin pa dang / nad tsi lu ta dang / rkang shu byung ba la sa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te
118a2(rgyud): bskus na lan gsum gyi tha ma la sos par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya gzhig na chab kyis bgyi'o// dbyig dug bsal bar bgyi na rkang lag bkrus la snod du rtsal de de nas rtsa ku shas bya bas na
118a3(rgyud): 'byang bar 'gyur ro// gdon smon lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thal bas bgyi'o// nad ci lu ma mchis par bgyi na mtshon rnon pos sa shur gyis dras la yang rked du bcad na ci lu ma mchis
118a4(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// nad bri ha ma mchis par bgyi ba yang de bzhino// / 'dzer ba ma mchis par bgyi na sa la lan bdun bzla/ sa brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la
118a5(rgyud): nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo'i mdun du mchod pa nus bgyis la gi wang ras dkar po'i steng du bzhag ste 'bar gyi bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas blang bar bgyis
118a6(rgyud): te/ blangs nas thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur/ 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig slongs mo pa'i zas 'tshal zhing tha mar zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyi
118a7(rgyud): la mar gyi ngo nag bcu bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ shu dag chang bar bcangs la sbrul du gyur gyi bar bzlas brjod bgyi zhing / des mi 'jigs par bgyi'o// slar
118a8(rgyud): yang shu dag tu gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas bza' bar bgyi ste/ 'tshal ba tsam gyis gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog can du 'gyur zhing lo lnga stong thub par 'gyuraro// mar gying
118b1(rgyud): zhag brgyad la lha chen po gan su mchis la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la/ lha chen po gzhog g.yas par lig bu mig a shwat+tha'i lo ma'i steng du bzhag ste/ du ba 'thul gyi bar du bzlas
118b2(rgyud): brjod bgyi'o// de nas lig bu mig blangs te/ lha'i skal ba bzhag la mig la bskus na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// lo bdun stong thub par 'gyuraro// arga'i me tog dur khrod kyi mes bsreg/ 
118b3(rgyud): nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis nas lha chen po'i gnasu mchis la shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma'i steng du bzhag ste lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la thig le bgyi
118b4(rgyud): nami gda' bar 'gyur ro// lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro// / zla ba gcig skyo 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi dal mi'i rus pa zla gam lta bur bgyis la de nas rig sngags
118b5(rgyud): 'chang gi ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du la ga na rdo rje'i gzugs dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gzu gas bzhag la rig sngags 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das dang / 
118b6(rgyud): lag na rdo rje dang / dbang phyug chen po rgya cher mchod de/ rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis la zla gam blangs te ras dkar po'i steng du bzhag la
118b7(rgyud): 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas blangs te mgo bor bzhag na ci 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gzugasu yang bsgyur/ yid kyis ga
118b8(rgyud): bsams pa de thams cad kyang 'gru'o// lo stong thub par 'gyuraro// 'chi ba'i dus kyang 'tshalo// zasu 'o skyo 'tshal zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sh+li shwe ta ka'i shing gis zhugs bus la/ a pa maH/ 
119a1(rgyud): yam sreg shing 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na rgyal po nyid 'thob bo// rdo rje gdong gi cho ga rdzog so// / rdo rje lte ba'i las rnams lag te ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung
119a2(rgyud): bas ma god pa'i ras la sprin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar ram ras kyi sham thabs can bri bar bya'o// de'i g.yas
119a3(rgyud): rol tu rdo rje'i lte ba gser gyi mdog lta bu bri bar bgyis te/ de yang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang za su 'o skyo 'tshal bar bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi/ 
119a4(rgyud): nas zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te/ ci nus kyi mchodadapa bgyis la tsan dan dmar po mtho gang la rdo rje bgyi das te/ rdo rje'i rked par ldong ros bzhag la/ byang chub kyi shing gi
119a5(rgyud): lo mas ga yogs te/ dngos grub rnam gsum byung gi ba ra du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar bar gyur na bska la bar gnas shing rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi tshugs
119a6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad stong gyen du 'phags cing de'i modado la slar mchi'o// gang gi tshe 'gum pa de'i lag na rdo rje'i rigasu skye'o// ci ste du ba 'thul nas blangs te thig le bgyis na ma gda' bar 'gyur/ lo
119a7(rgyud): bcu drug lon pa lta bu'i lus su 'gyur/ lo bdun stong thub par 'gyur ro// bro bar gyur nas blangs la thig ler bgyis na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur te/ dud 'gre'i skye gnas su gtogs pa
119a8(rgyud): yang dbang du 'gyu ro// zla ba gcig zasu chu grog 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te/ ba lang gi lhas sam kun dga'i ra ba 'am/ yang na gnas gtsang
119b1(rgyud): mar mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la/ ldeng ros til gyi lo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag ste/ gdol pa'i bu mo'i mo mtshan nam/ 'ji ba la bgyis pa'i mo mtshan gyi steng du bzhag par bgyi zhing / 
119b2(rgyud): gdol pa'i bu mo rol gri thogs pa bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag par bgyis la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gi dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar bar gyur na
119b3(rgyud): gdugs shar ba 'dra ba'i mdog tu 'gyur/ skra lcang lo 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// lo bcu drug lon pa lta bur 'gyur/ 'og tu dpag tshad stong du mchi bar 'gyur/ steng du yang de bzhin
119b4(rgyud): mchi bar 'gyur/ dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi thos shi dang mthong bar 'gyur/ lo khro nyis stong 'tshe bar 'gyur/ nam mkha' la rlung gi shugs dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ 
119b5(rgyud): grub pa thams cad kyang 'dis dbang du 'gyur/ tshes gra ngas dang skar ma bdam mi 'tshal/ bsnyung ba ba gyi mi 'tshal te/ bud med kyi ro blangs la lig bu mig de'i mo mtsha/ 
119b6(rgyud): gyi steng du bzhag ste/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis te// lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la/ lig bu mig de blangs
119b7(rgyud): ste mig la skus na mi gda' bar 'gyur/ lo bdun stong thub par 'gyuraro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ gdol pa'i khyim nas zhugs blangs la seng
119b8(rgyud): ldeg gi shing gis zhugs bus te dug dang khrag dang bsres pa'i yungs kar gyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na gang gi mong nas smos te/ sbyin sreg bgyis pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// mar
120a1(rgyud): gyi bo nag bcu gnyis la mi rus kyi thur mas blangs te lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la dgra'i khyim sgor btsugs nas dgung gsum gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro// 
120a2(rgyud): lte ba'i cho ga rdzogaso// / me kha la'i las rnams lags te srung ba bgyi na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i srad bus lag pa la bcing bar bgyi'o// yul gru srung
120a3(rgyud): na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o// dbab na bye'u rug pa'i lo ma 'am rma ba'i mdongs kyis bgyi'o// gdon la gnod pa bgyid na chab gyis bgyi'o// 
120a4(rgyud): khyim 'am lha khang 'am/ kun dga'i ra bar mchis la ga dang du bzlas brjod bgyis pa de nas 'byung po gdon tha dmas cad 'bros par 'gyuraro// gdon tshar bcad na khrag gis
120a5(rgyud): gzugs bris la rkang pa mnan te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla/ sa brjod bgyis na/ gdon gyi rigs phung bar 'a gyuraro// rig pa sgrub na thog ma nyid las 'di bgyis te/ lag na/ 
120a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i mdun du shre shwe ta ka'i shing gis zhugs bus la kur ba'i me tog brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na lha des rig pa'i lha bzung nas khrid de mchi'o// khrid de mchis nas dngos grub du 'gyur// 
120a7(rgyud): ci ste log 'dren rnams kyi rigs sgrub par 'tshal na/ log 'dren rnams kyi log 'dren gyi rigs ni bzhi mchis te/ so gcig pa'i rigs dang / kam po dza'i rigs dang / rnam par 'jom
120a8(rgyud): pa'i rigs dang / phung byed kyi rigs so// so gcig pa'i rigs la gtsug pud 'phyang la sogs pa log 'dren brgyad khri mchis te/ de dag ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dgas/ 
120b1(rgyud): bgyid do// kam po rdza'i rigs la ni dbang phyug chen po'i g.yog 'khor ba lang rna ba la sogs pa la bgegs drug khri mchis te/ dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa la bgegs bgyid cing rig pa
120b2(rgyud): yang 'joms par bgyid do// rnam par 'jams pa'i rigs la ni 'jig rten skyong ba'i g.yog 'khor mya ngan med la sogs pa log 'dren drug khri mchis te/ de dag kyang dbang phyug chen po dang phur bu
120b3(rgyud): gsum pa'i cho ga rgyas pa la bgegs bgyid// phung byed kyi rigs la ni lag na rdo rje'i g.yog 'khor murda ta ka la sogs pa'i log 'dren bye ba phrag 'bum mchis te/ de dag ni rig pa'i cho ga rgyas
120b4(rgyud): pa thams cad bgegs bgyid cing / rig pa yang 'joms dpar bgyid do// 'di ni log 'dren de dag gi sgrub pa la gas te/ so gcig pa'i rigs kyi sgrub pa ni mar gyi ngo nag bcu pa ni
120b5(rgyud): la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dur khrod kyi shing gis zhugs bus la ba lang gi ma/ khris pas sbags pa'i yungs kar la lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi
120b6(rgyud): nad kyi hud kyi hud ces 'chi ba'i sgra grag cing grub par 'gyur te/ grub nas kyang sgrub pa la bgegs mi bgyid de/ bde bar sgrub tu mchiso// skam po dza'i rigs kyi sgrub pa ni mar gyi ngo zhag lnga lo nyin zhag ga
120b7(rgyud): bsnyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje dang / dbang phyug chen po la mchod pa bgyis nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arga'i shing gos zhugs bus la mon sran gre'u dang mar bsres pa la lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi
120b8(rgyud): rdo rje'i gzugs 'gul te/ de nas grub par 'gyuraro// grub nas kyang dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bklags pa tsam gyis rig pa thad 'gru'o// rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs kyis sgrub pa ni mar gyi ngo
121a1(rgyud): / zhag bcu ban la nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te/ mtshan gcig mchis par mchis la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis la log 'dren rnams la yang gtor ma brgya'o// de
121a2(rgyud): mdun du be kang ta'i zhugs bus la khrag dang bsres pa'i yungs kar gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na de'i 'og tu grib ma gda' zhing grub par 'gyur ro// rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs/ 
121a3(rgyud): grub na log 'dren rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du dgos pa de thams cad bgyid do// phung byed kyi rigs kyi sgrub pa ni zla ba phyed zas su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la
121a4(rgyud): nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la zhugs mar gnyis bus t+yaM/ gcig ni lag na rdo rje la dbulo// gcig ni murba ta ka la
121a5(rgyud): 'bulo// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis srung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du seng ldeng gi shing gis bus te/ na le sham dkar po dag gi khrag bsres pas lan brgya stong
121a6(rgyud): sbyin sreg bgyis na/ lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong las 'od zer byung ste/ de nas grub par 'gyuraro// phung byed kyi rigs sgrub na rig pa'i cho ga thams cad bde bar sgrub tu mchis te/ 
121a7(rgyud): bgegs ma mchis pa'o// log 'dren de dag kyang phyag brnyan du 'gyur ro// log 'dren rnams kyang rig sngags 'chang la gsang sngags stsol te/ des lo stong thub par 'gyur// za su 'o thug
121a8(rgyud): 'tshal zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na me kha la grub par 'gyur te/ gdugs gcig bzhin kar sha ba na brgya stong stsol to// rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na dag lnga/ 
121b1(rgyud): rgyal lo// mar gyi ngo nag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du pad+ma brgya stong phul na/ rig pa'i rgyal po dam pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// me kha la'i cho ga rdzog so// 
121b2(rgyud): gdon dkar mo'i las rnams lags te ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sprin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis lag na rdo rje mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pho
121b3(rgyud): nya mo bcu gnyis kyis bskor ba bri bar bgyi ste kha dog ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bgyi'o// pho nya mo thams cad kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi'o// tha mar ri'i rtse mo rnams bri bar
121b4(rgyud): bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo tshas gtsadag nas brtsams te zas su chu sgrog 'tshal zhing mar gyi/ dpo nag brgyad la thug gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// mar
121b5(rgyud): gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la 'byung po'i gtor ma yang bzang du bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis
121b6(rgyud): ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la pad+ma zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar la spags pa brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas ca co'i sgra chen po grag par 'gyur te/ de la mi 'jig
121b7(rgyud): par bgyi'o// de nas gdong dkar mo gzugs mi sdug par bsgyur nas mchi ste/ de la yang mi 'jigs par bgyi'o// rdo rje gzhad ma'i bzlas brjod bgyis la de la 'di skad ces lag na rdo rje'i
121b8(rgyud): gnang chen ma bcom ldan 'das ma khyod legs par byon tam zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de de skad thos nas dga' bar 'gyur te/ des 'di skad du ci bya ba zhes brjod pa dang / bcom ldan
122a1(rgyud): / 'das ma lo lnga stong thub par 'tshalo zhes brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas dga' ba'i yid kyis ral gri stsol te// de nas mi gda' bar 'gyuraro// ral gri/ 
122a2(rgyud): de blangs nas sgra lcang lor 'khyil bar 'gyur/ gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog can du gyur/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// ma bsgrubs par las rnams 'grub
122a3(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// dbab par bgyi na gdon gyis zin pa'i rkang pa la rkang pas mnan te dbab par bgyi'o// 'byung po dang sha za rnams dbab na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis
122a4(rgyud): bgyi'o// dug las gson yal gas bgyi'o// gdon bza' ba dar bgyi na lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i me to ngag dmar pos bgyi'o// gdon 'khungs par bgyi na yid
122a5(rgyud): kyis bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o// dbye bar bgyi na mar gyi / zhag brgyad nas brtsams te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du gdugs bdun dus gsum du ba ru ri'i shing gis zhugs
122a6(rgyud): bus la/ sbrul khog rjes pa'i bsregs blugs gsum sbyin sreg bgyi'o// long bar bgyi na dbang phyug chen po'i gnasu mchis la ne'u le'i lces lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bgyi zhing ming nas
122a7(rgyud): phyung nas lang bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du shu dag brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bgyis na snga mkha bzhin du 'gyuraro// gdong dkar mo'i cho ga rdzogaso// / rdo rje ser mo'i las
122a8(rgyud): rnams lags te yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ dur khrod du zlo ba drug bzlas brjod bgyis na rgyal po nyid stsol to// zla ba gsum bzlas brjod bgyis na/ nyi che ba'i longs
122b1(rgyud): spyang rnams tshul to// tha ba na cig pazlas brjod pakyis na dadar khwanyas pa bum to// 3 khas sun grangs ma'i bas rnams papa' bar 'argyal// dgra spyang par 'tshal na than/ 
122b2(rgyud): bkra'i mdab ma blangs te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la dgra'i khyim du bzhag na dgra 'phral du bros so// gzhan nad kyis 'debs par 'tshal na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la lag
122b3(rgyud): na rdo rje'i mdun du shing badz+ra'i rtsa bas rdo rje la bdug par bgyi zhing / rig pa yang lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na gang yid la bsams pa de nad kyis thebs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i bdun
122b4(rgyud): du ce bog gis bdug cing rig pa yang lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod pa dgyis na gsos pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// 'byung po da dang sha za rnams rengs par bgyi na yid kyis bgyi'o// 
122b5(rgyud): dbab pa'i me long gis bgyis te/ me'i sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i thal bas dag par byis la khye'u dag bstan na bden pa badz+ra do// gdon bskrad na yungs kar gtun du brdungs na
122b6(rgyud): ngu zhing gtong bar 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi sol bas la gzugs bris la de'i lag pa 'am mgul par lag na rdo rje bris te mnan na gtong bar 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig/ 
122b7(rgyud): bsnyung ba byas te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du yungs kar za ma tog tu stsal la bzlas brjod bgyis na des reg pa tsam gyis gdon du zhing gtong bar 'gyur ro// dgra bsad par 'tshal na dur khrod kyi sol ba
122b8(rgyud): blangs la gzugs bris te snying khar mnan la bzlas brjod bgyis na 'phral du dag ma lags par 'gyuraro// tshes grangs dang skar ma mi 'tshal bsnyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal te/ dgra skam par bgyi na mar
123a1(rgyud): gyi ngo nag brgyad la/ shing mdan las gzugs bgyis la seng ldeng gi phur bu snying khar btsugs te/ rig pa gang lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na nad dag pos 'debs shing
123a2(rgyud): skam par yang 'gyuraro// phyung na sos par yang 'gyuraro// rdo rje ser mo'i cho ga rdzogaso// / nag ser gyi las rnams lags te/ yu gru srung na chab kyis bgyi'o// mtshams bcad
123a3(rgyud): na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i phur bus bgyi'o// sman srung na yid kyis bgyi'o// rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa rnams dgar thal mos brdabs pas bgyi'o// rig sngags ba
123a4(rgyud): na mtshon rnon pos sa la shu ba rer dras na rig sngags bcad par 'gyuraro// gdon dbab na yid kyis bgyi'o// gdon smon lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i me tog gis bgyi'o// 
123a5(rgyud): yar gyi ngo tshas brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ rgya mtsher 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la rig pa lan brgya ste/ nga bzlas brjod bgyis na 'grub par 'gyuraro// grub nas lasu
123a6(rgyud): gyur te/ glang po che rengs par bgyi ba dang / rta rengs par bgyi ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rengs par bgyi ba dang / gang yid la bsams pa de dag thams cad rengs par bgyidado// mar gyi ngo
123a7(rgyud): zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bstang ba bgyis te/ nag mo'i mdun du arga'i shing gi zhags bus la 'bras sa lu mar dang sres pas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na nag mo mchis par 'gyur te/ de la
123a8(rgyud): po nya ma'o gsang sngags kyis mchod yon phul na de khyod nyid la dam pa gang sbyin par bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// de la 'od skad du sa'i bdag por gyur pa stsal cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// des 'di skad yul
123b1(rgyud): gcig gi rgyal por gyur cig ces brjod na de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod par bgyi ste/ slar btang ba'i gsang sngags kyis kyang slar btang zhing / me tog dkar pos kyang slar btang na de nas mi ganga' bar
123b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lung thang gi shing drung na gtum mo// kha shar phyogs bstan pa mchis pa de'i mdun du mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te du ba ma mchis pa'i bdag mar me'i snying
123b3(rgyud): po brgya stong bor na di nar stong stsol to// nag ser gyi cho ga rdzog so// / rdo rje bstod de 'dzin pa'i las rnams lags te/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyi/ 
123b4(rgyud): te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du me tog dkar po brgya stong phul na mtshadan mas btab pa stong stsol to// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ lag ni rdo rje'i/ 
123b5(rgyud): pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong nas bzung la gzugs 'gul gyi ba ra du bzlas brjod bgyis na yid kyis bsams pas rengs par bgyid de dud 'gro'i skye gnas 'chi ba'i sems can
123b6(rgyud): dedag thams cad rengs par bgyid do// yid kyis grol bar 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lag na rdo rje la mchod pa bgyis la ci
123b7(rgyud): sh+le shwe ta ka'i pur bu blangs te/ skud pa dmar pos dkris la de nas rig sngags 'chang gis pa la sha'i shing gis zhugs bus te/ pur bu la lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la de nas dum bu gsu
123b8(rgyud): dubacad de/ dum bu re re la lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod bgyis la zhug su bor na nang bar ti na ra sum stong stsol to// yar gyi ngo tshas brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ rgya mtshar 'bab
124a1(rgyud): ba'i chu klung du zhugs la pad+ma 'bum phul na rgyal po nyid stsol to// skyes pa dbang du bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du byang
124a2(rgyud): chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la ku mu de'i me tog zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar las spags pa brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na skyes pa dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag bcu gnyis la
124a3(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dri mchog gi me tog brgya stong gis lag na rdo rje la bsno na na bud med dbang du 'gyuraro// rdo rje bstod de 'dzin gyi cho ga rdzogaso// / rdo rje seng ge'i
124a4(rgyud): khri'i las rnams lags te/ dbab na gdon gyis zin pa 'am ma zin pa yang rung / gu gul gyis dba'o// gdon bci dngas na yid kyis bgyi'o// gdon skrag par bgyi nag du/ 
124a5(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thal mos brdab par bgyi'o// gdon 'a/ bros par bgyi na sol bas gzugs bris la lcug mas bsnun na gtong bar 'gyuraro// gdon skam na gu
124a6(rgyud): gul gyi bdug pas bgyi'o// gdon bza' bar bgyi na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i shas bgyi'o// gdon bcad ni mtshon rnon pos rtswa ku shaM bcad na gdon bcad par 'gyuraro// dug sI
124a7(rgyud): na chab 'am yal gas bgyi'o// byis pa gdon gyis zin pa rnams la yal gas byab par bgyi'o// chur mi 'bying bar bgyi na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis bgyi'o// 
124a8(rgyud): mtshon gyis mi tshugs par bgyi na yid kyis bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du tsan dan dmar pos gdong dmar bris te/ de la gtor ma sna tshogs srul cing grog mkha
124b1(rgyud): gyis la mdung rtse gsum pa bgyis te lag pa g.yon na rdo rje thogs pa mdung rtse gsum pa'i steng du mchis te/ lan brgya steng bzlas brjod bgyis na gter mthong bar 'gyuraro// yar gya tha chos ldanas
124b2(rgyud): brtsams te rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang gi 'khar los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ rig sngags lan dgu stong gi g.yog 'khor dang ldan
124b3(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// bskal par gnas par yang 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig za su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum bsrung ba bgyis te/ dbang phyug chen po'i gnasu mchis
124b4(rgyud): la glo g.yas log su mchod pa bgyis te/ phag rgod kyi mche ba la/ gau wang gis bskus la ras dkar po'i steng du bzhi/ dag ste/ rig pa bzlas brjod bgyis na/ bgegs/ 
124b5(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ste rig pa'i rgyal pos bsnun par bgyi'o// de nas mche ba de 'bar bar 'gyur te/ 'bar nas blang bar bgyi'o// blangs ma thag tu mdung rtse gsum par
124b6(rgyud): 'gyur te/ rig sngags thams cad kyi spyod yul du mi 'gyur/ dpag tshad gyen du 'phag par 'gyuraro// lo dgu stong thub par 'gyuraro// rdo rje seng ge'i khri'i cho ga rdzog so// 
124b7(rgyud): rdo rje ldan ma'i las rnams lags te/ ri ma mkhan gso sbyong gzung bas ma gos pa'i ras la sprin dang ma 'dres pa'i mtshon gyis 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis
124b8(rgyud): brgyan pa bri bar bya'o// de'i g.yas rol du rdo rje dang lag bzang kyang bri bar bgyi ste/ gnyis g.yong gser gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// g.yon rol du rdo rje ldan ma
125a1(rgyud): / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri'o// ba mar ri'i rje mo rnams kyi bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi tshes gcig nas brtsams te zas su ma sgyu 'tshal zhing zla ba nya
125a2(rgyud): bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas zhag gsum bsnang ba bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la bil ba'i shing gis zhugs bus la bil ba'i me tog zho dang sbrang rtsi dang
125a3(rgyud): mar la spyugs pa brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas rdo rje'i 'gul nas grub par 'gyur te/ nyin gcig bzhin di na ra lnga lnga stsol to// de bzhin du dgod par bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag
125a4(rgyud): bzhi la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ ri mo'i gzu dgas kyi bdun du dra ba ma mchis pa'i mdag ma a ka ru ste dang sbyin sreg bgyis na ri mo'i gzugs kyi me tog gi phreng ba
125a5(rgyud): 'gul nas grub par 'gyur te/ grub nas yul gru stsol/ to// bud med dbang du bgyi na gdugs bdun dus gsu ma du ka ra bi ri'i shing gos zhugs bus la mar dang bsres pa
125a6(rgyud): yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg lan brgya stong bgyi'o// yugs sa mo dbang du bgyi na sa phyogs gtsang mar lung thang gi shing gi zhugs bus la til la lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na yugs sa
125a7(rgyud): mo dbang du 'gyur ro// skyes pa dbang du bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi lta/ zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arga'i shing gi zhugs bus la ske tshe'i 'bru la lan brgyad
125a8(rgyud): stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro// rdo rje ldan ma'i cho ga rdzogs// rdo rje gnad ma'i las rnams lags te/ dbab na me tog dkar po dag gis bgyi'o// 
125b1(rgyud): na yid kyis bgyi'o// sgrar stsal na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o// gang bgyid du stsal na gu gul gyis bdug par bgyi'o// zas sul na ka ra bi ra'i me tog la lan bdun
125b2(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis par bgyi'o// brjod du stsa la na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa brjod do// gdon dgod du stsal na lan bdun bzlas brjed
125b3(rgyud): bgyis pa'i me tog gtor to// bcing na chab kyis bgyi'o// brdeg na se gol gtogs pa bgyi'o// tshar bcad na rtsa la lan bdun sngags kyis btab la mgo la bzhag na myos par 'gyur te gdon
125b4(rgyud): 'bros so// bcad na ba lang gi lci ba la gzur bgyis la mtshon rnon pos bcad na bcad par 'gyuraro// gdon bsdig dpa dang rgyug tu gzhug na mdzub mos bsdigs par bgyi'o// 
125b5(rgyud): gdon dkyil 'khor du bzhugs na rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bsnun na dkyil 'khor du gzhago// gdon 'bros par bgyi na gdon gyi mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na gdon du zhing
125b6(rgyud): 'broso// gdon spon yid kyis gar 'tshal ba der sbad // dug dbab na sra rtsi pog gis bdug pas bgyi'o// phur bu dbab na lung tang gi lo ma'i bdug pas bgyi'o// rims dbab na ka ri ba ra'i/ 
125b7(rgyud): me tog gi bdug pas bgyi'o// rims zhag bzhi pa dbab na mangs bgyi'o// srung ba bgyis na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i srad bus bgyi'o// chang ma rung bar bgyi na gseg ma la lan bdun bzlas
125b8(rgyud): brjod bgyis la khang stengs su bor na chang ma rung bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// gdon gyis btab par bgyi na yid kyis bgyi'o// skyes pa dang bud med dbang du bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas brtsams te/ 
126a1(rgyud): gdugs bdun dus gsum du phrab ma las lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro// dbye bar bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rjer
126a2(rgyud): mdun du skyes pa'i sgra las lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dpe bgyis par 'gyuraro// ro langs sgrub par 'tshal bas tshes grangs dang skar ma bdam mi 'tshal/ bsnyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal bas bud
126a3(rgyud): med kyi ro langs la spos dang bdug pas mchod de/ mgo shar phyogasu bstan la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rdo rje bzhad ma brjod par bgyis na bud med de dgod cing ldang bar 'gyur te de la nyal
126a4(rgyud): po bgyi'o// gal te ma nus na rig sngags 'chang gis la gor/ du rig pa mchog dran par bgyi zhing snying po gnyis ka ba/ zlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun par bgyi'o/ 
126a5(rgyud): de nas bud med de dgod cing mchi ste de la brtsed par bgyi'o// de nas bud med de sbrum par gyur te/ de nas rig sba 'am gis rdo rje bzhad ma bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis
126a6(rgyud): bsnun par bgyi'o// de nas de mi 'gul bar 'gyuraro// yang rig pa mchog gis yungs kar gyis bsnun par 'gyi'o// de nas lto 'gas te bzhad ma bzlas brjod bgyis la mngal blang bar bgyi'o// 
126a7(rgyud): mngal blangs nas kyang yungs kar gyis bsnun na dum bu brgyar 'gyur te phru ma'i nang du sul la mi thod gsum gyi steng du mchis la yongasu smin par 'gyur gyi bar du rdo rje bzhad ma bzlas brjod bgyis
126a8(rgyud): la blangs te grogs rnams la stsal cing 'tshal na skra lcang lo 'khyil par 'gyur/ gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog tu 'gyur/ lo bcu drug lon pa lte bur 'gyur/ nam mkha' la mchig
126b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad bran du 'gyur/ rdo rje'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur/ dpag tshad stong gyen du 'phags par 'gyur/ dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyis thos par 'gyur/ lo
126b2(rgyud): brgyad khri thub par 'gyur/ mtshon chas lus la mi tshugs par 'gyur/ rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/ bdag 'chi bar 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// lha'i sgrub pa ni zla ba gcig zasu chu grog 'tshal zhing de'i 'og
126b3(rgyud): tu mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje mchod cing lha thams cad kyang mchod par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ldong ros shing
126b4(rgyud): a shrat+tha'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag ste dngos grub gsum 'byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar bar dgyur na na mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul na/ 
126b5(rgyud): mi gda' bar 'gyur/ lo lnga stong thub pa'i rig sngags 'amang nyid du 'gyur/ lo lnga stong thub pa'i rkang gis 'gro/ bar 'gyuraro// sa phyogs gang na gnod sbyin mo mchis pa de
126b6(rgyud): gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis teganas dben par mchis la dur khrod kyi shing gis zhugs bus la seng ldeng gi yam sreg shing khrag dang dug la bsnyugs pa lan brgya
126b7(rgyud): stong sbyin sreg bgyis na gnod sbyin mo de mchi bar 'gyur te/ mchis nas 'di skad du ci bya zhes mchi ba dang / des 'di skad du gang bsams pa de gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o// gal te gu
126b8(rgyud): na 'ad skad du dpag tshad brgya nas bud med pa'i gan du khrid nga shog/ grogs po brgyad cu la zan byin cig/ nyin gcig bzhin ras zung brgyad dang / kar sha pa na brgyad brgyad phul cig ces brjod
127a1(rgyud): de ltar bgyi'o// zhes mchi bar 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu bud med khrid de mchi'// yid kyis slar btang bar bgyi'o// rdo rje bzhad ma'i cho ga rdzog so// / pho nya mo thams
127a2(rgyud): cad kyi las ni 'di lags te/ rig pa mchog gi pho nya mo ni las thams cad du yang sbyar bar bgyi'o// las thams cad du yang rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig sbyar bar bgyi ste/ sgrub pa
127a3(rgyud): ma lags pa'i rig pa yang sgrub par bgyid do// srin bu ka ta'i dug gis gnod par gyur pa rnams la ni yi ge bri ba'i gzhi dang snag tsa dang smag gu yang sngags lan bdun bdun gyis bsngags la
127a4(rgyud): gang 'dod pa bris te bskur na sos par 'gyur ro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang gis rig pa thad
127a5(rgyud): dngos grub du 'gyur ba stsol ba'i rig pa'i lha thams cad kyi gsang ba brjod par bgyi'o// gal te rig sngags 'chang rig pa sgrub par 'tshal na rig pa'i lha de la 'dis mgu bar
127a6(rgyud): bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo nag bcu bzhi la zhag cig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi ngogs gnyi ga'i sa blangs la lha'i gzugs bgyis te sprin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshen gyis lha'i kha dog ci
127a7(rgyud): 'dra ba de 'dra bar bri bar bgyi'o// mar sbrang rtsis lto dgang bar bgyi'o// me tog pad+ma'i dbus su lha de bzhag par bgyi'o// pad+ma'i ze ba ni a ga ru dang tsan dan gyi bsku bar bgyi'o// dus gsum du
127a8(rgyud): bdug pas kyang 'dug par bgyi ste/ gu gul dang / du ru ka dang / ga pur dang / shing sha mo'i me tog dang / de rnams bsres pa'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi'o// gdugs gsum gyi bar du bgyi'o// 
127b1(rgyud): de nas gzugs de 'o ma'i drung du stsal te zhig par ma gyur gyi bar du bzhag la zhig nas 'o ma rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chab kyi nang du stsol to// de nas sbyor ba 'dis lha de mgu bar 'gyur zhing dga' ba maH
127b2(rgyud): ste myur du dngos grub kyang stsal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rig pa'i rigs thams cad kyang gsang ba lags te/ 'dis lha thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'di ni bad
127b3(rgyud): gis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du brjod do// bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po bdag gis bshad pa 'di ni rig sngags thams cad kyi rgyal po ste/ rig pa thams cad sgrub du stsal
127b4(rgyud): ba mtshungs pa ma mchis pami mnyam pa dang mnyam pa// zla ma mchis pa lag so// 'di ni bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du bshad// de nas bcom
127b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis thams cad kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs chen po lag na rdo/ 
127b6(rgyud): rje mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag
127b7(rgyud): na rdo rje la gang gis 'di ltar yid kyi phyag 'tshal na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag dgu la phyag byas par 'gyuraro// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis la
127b8(rgyud): gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' khyod de bzhin gshegs pas bstod cing bkur te bsngags pa legaso legaso// brtson 'grus dang brtul ba chen po dang ldan pa le gson bya ba
128a1(rgyud): // swAs de nas gnon nu rdo rje sdes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs dang lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces spraso// yab bdag kyang rig pa
128a2(rgyud): mchog la dga' bas gang gis rig pa mchog sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang de la gnod sbyin thams cad dang / log 'dren thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang / grub pa thad dang / 
128a3(rgyud): klu thams cad dang / yi dgas thams cad dang / grul bum thams cad bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur bar sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du gsang sngags sprul bar bgyi'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi
128a4(rgyud): dbang po lag na rdo rjes gzhon nu rdo rje sde la 'di skad ces smraso// bzhin bzang khyod sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa legaso// bzhin bzang khyod rig pa mchog gi don phyir
128a5(rgyud): gsang sngags smros shig de nas phas gnang bas gzhon nu rdzarje sde dga' mgu yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab sa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas log 'dren nges par gzhig pa'i
128a6(rgyud): gsang sngags spras pa/ na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+hArmA ya/ na moHsaM g+hA ya/ na ma sh+tsan+da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo badz+ra sa na ya/ ku ma ra rU pa d+hA ra Ni/ a pra ti ha tA ya/ ma hA ba
128a7(rgyud): la pa rA kra mA ya/ tsa la tsa la/ ku la ku la/ ma tha ma tha/ nA sha ya sarba big+h+nAn/ bi nA ya kan ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ma ra ma ra/ bin+da bin+da/ ye ma ma duSh+Ta/ ts+tshin+da staM mya kr-in+ta dzam+ba mo ha ya
128a8(rgyud): ni sum+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya swA hA/ sgrub pa'i dus na grogs mkhar gyi si las rdo rje bgyi sa te srung ba bgyi'o// srung ba'i dus na til nag pos sbyin sreg brgya stong bgyis na bgegs thams cad bcom par
128b1(rgyud): 'gyuraro// sgrub pa'i dus na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis mtshams bcad do// rkang rjes kyi sa 'am thal ba la lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis te/ srung ba bgyi'o// sgrub pa'i
128b2(rgyud): dus na 'jim pa las rdo rje'i gzugs bgyis te/ spos dang me tog dang bdug pas mchod la rig pa lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na sgrub pa'i byin gyis rlob par bgyid cing dngos grub du 'gyuraro// lha rnams
128b3(rgyud): dbab na gu gul gyi bdug pas bgyi'o// klu dkrug par bgyi na/ rdo rje'i phyag brgya bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas brjod lan brgyad brgya bgyis te/ gang na klu gnas pa'i mtsho dar bor na klu thams cad sdug
128b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// dri za rnams g.yos par bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag rgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje/ 'i mdun du dur khrod kyi sol bas dri za'i gzugs bris la/ de'i lha
128b5(rgyud): bar srin lag bzhag ste/ rig pa lan brgya stong brjod na snying du brjod pas mchi bar 'gyur te/ mchis nas bar snang la sa sman 'dor te/ de 'tshal na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ dri za tham
128b6(rgyud): cad kyang srung bar 'gyu ro// gnod sbyin rnams brlag par bgyi na phyogs gang na gnod sbyin nam gnod sbyin mo gnas pa'i phyogs der mchis la lcags phur sor bzhi pa blangs te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad
128b7(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyis te btsugs na gnod sbyin 'gros par 'gyuraro// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na ri mo mkhon gso sbyong gzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs gser gyi mdog can bri
128b8(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// de'i g.yon rol du lag na rdo rje mdag sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa bri'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas rol du rdo rje sde gzhon nu'i gzugs 'dzin pa gser gyi mdog can
129a1(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pa na pad+ma g.yas pas dam pa sbyin par bri'o// de'i 'og rol du sgrub pa po lag na pog por thogs pa bri'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zlas pa phyed zas
129a2(rgyud): su 'o skyo 'thung zhing rig pa bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bstang ba bgyis te rgya cher mchod la gtor ma yang rgya cher bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis
129a3(rgyud): sna ma'i me tog brgya stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la phog par bgyi'o// dngos grub kyi mtshan mar ni mar me'i me lce gyen du mchi la spu zing zhes bgyid na dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// yid kyis gang
129a4(rgyud): bsams pa de stsol te rig sngags 'chang nyid dang 'dod pa dang ldan pa ni ma gtog so// las thams cad du yang sbyar b.rabagyi ste/ yid kyi las bgyi'o// rdo rje sde'i cho ga rdzog/ 
129a5(rgyud): so// / de nas mu d+ha da kas lag/ na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso// yab bdag ni khyod kyi ri/ ga sngags kyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad la bgegs bgyid pa
129a6(rgyud): lags mod kyi gang dag rig pa mchog sgrub pa de dag la bdag slar bcing ba stsal bar bgyi'o// bdag bcings na rig sngags 'chang de la su yang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// bzhin bzang
129a7(rgyud): de de bzhin te bdag cag bcing ba smos shig spros shig/ de nas mur+ha Ta kas lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ bdag bcing ba'i gsang sngags smras pa/ na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ 
129a8(rgyud): na sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA NI s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ rdo rje ru ru kha ro bo la ri/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tsa la ya tsa la ya/ badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ a kr-i d+ha b+ha sha d+ha/ s+pha ra s+pha ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swAhU~M/ lagan rdo rje dang mur+ha Te ka'i mdu/ 
129b1(rgyud): du me tog dmar po dang bdug pas mchod la/ de nas sgrub pa'i dus na srad bu dkar po la mdud pa gsum dor ro// su zhig rtag tu 'chang ba de la thams cad dngos grub du 'gyur ro// sgrub pa thams/ 
129b2(rgyud): cad dang las thams cad du yang spra tshil las murta Ta ka'i gzugs bgyis te/ lag pa g.yon na mdung rtse gsum pa thogs par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tsan dan dmar po'i mdung rtse gsu
129b3(rgyud): pas snying khar btsugs pa de'i 'og tu rje'u nag pos bkang ste/ dngos grub stsal gyi bar du bzhag par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mdung rtse gsum pa phyung la 'o mas bkrus te
129b4(rgyud): rig pa yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la tham das cad bgyi'o// gal te las de ltar ma bgyis na sa grub tu mi 'gyuraro// murba Ta ki'i sgrub pa lags te/ rim
129b5(rgyud): mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs gser gyi kha dog can bri bar bgyi'o// de dwa zhin gshegs pa'i g.yon rol du leg na rdo rje mdog sngo bas
129b6(rgyud): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas rol du ni 'phags pa kun dga' bo gser gyi mdog can lag na rnga yab thogs pa bri'o// lag na rdo rje'i 'og logasu su Taka
129b7(rgyud): mdog dmar la mig gsum pa 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa gad mo rta gang 'byin cing / lag pa g.yas pa kha 'gram du bzhag pa bri'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la
129b8(rgyud): nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la de'i mdun du a kar sha'i shing gos zhugs bus te yungs kar dang / til nag mo dang / 'bras yos
130a1(rgyud): dang / 'di rnams mar dang bsres pa la lan brgya stong bgyis na ri mo'i gzugs kyi me tog gi phreng ba 'gul bar 'gyur te dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// dngos grub tu gyur na rdo rje'i rigs
130a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi dngos grub tu 'gyuraro// las gzhan dag kyang bgyis te/ sbrul gyis zin pa dbab na sa rtsi bog gi bdug pas bgyi'o// gdon bskrad na rkang rjes kyi sa lag mthil du mdung rtse gsum
130a3(rgyud): bris la bstan na gdon du nizhing 'bros so// skyes pa dang bud med dbang du bgyi na murta Ta ka la phyag bgyis la gdugs gang yang rung ste shwe smes ta ka'i shing gis zhugs bus la/ ba ru ra'i me tog
130a4(rgyud): brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyuraro// mo mtshan bdang bar 'tshal na dur khrod kyi thal ba dur khrod kyi ras kyis ba cings la rig pa yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis/ 
130a5(rgyud): na mo mtshan bcings par 'gyur ro// dgrol na dbye'o// byis pa gdon rkam byed kyis zin pa rnams ni chab la lan brgya brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te bkrus na sos par 'gyur ro// 
130a6(rgyud): 'byung po dang / 'dre dang / klu rnams bskrad na thal brdabs pas bgyi'o// Ar+ya mA NA Ta ka'i cho ga rdzog so// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
130a7(rgyud): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar na/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang lag na rdo rje la gsang
130a8(rgyud): sngags stsal bar bgyi'o// lag na rdo rje 'di ni khro bo'i gos dkar mo'i snying po gton pa tsam gyis 'grub pa ste 'di kho bos brjod par bgyi'o// 'di gton pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad
130b1(rgyud): rengengs par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ b+ha ga ba te/ oM b+ha ya na sha ni trA sa ni/ trA sa ya/ b+h+r-i ku Ti ta ti be ta ti swA hA// rig pa 'di bton pa tsam gyis bgegs thams cad bcom
130b2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// bdag srung na thal ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o// gzhan srung na spyi bor lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis te/ skra mdud par bgyi'o// sems can tham
130b3(rgyud): cad rengs par bgyi na yid kyis bgyi'o// dbang du bgyi na yar gyi ngo zla ba nya la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du byang chub kyi shing gi zhugs
130b4(rgyud): bus la til gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro// ma rung bar bgyi 'tshal na mi rus kyi phu ro dbu blangs la lan brgya stong sngags kyis btab ste/ dgra'i
130b5(rgyud): khyim du btsugs na dgra ma rung bar 'gyuraro// dgra 'gum na ma ra gyi ngo zhag brgyad la dur khrod kyi thal ba blangs te dur khrod kyi zhugs su lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na 'gu mo/ 
130b6(rgyud): bskam na mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la chab lte ba nub tsam du zhugs la dgra'i srog bskams kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// mtshams bcad par 'tshal na seng ldang gi phur pa sor bzhi pa blangs te
130b7(rgyud): phur bu re re la yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la phyogs bzhir btsugs na mtshams bcad par 'gyuraro// yul 'khor bcing na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i
130b8(rgyud): chab kyis bgyi'o// sems can rnams bskrad na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis bgyi'o// lig bu mig dang ldong ros sgrub na zla ba gcig zas su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing yar gyi
131a1(rgyud): ngo chos brgyad nas zhag gsum bsrung ba bgyis te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar shing a shwad+tha'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du lig phra/ 
131a2(rgyud): mig dang ldong ros bzhag pa dngos grub gsum byung gis bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar na ni lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang sga lcang lo 'khyil pa can du 'gyur ro// dub
131a3(rgyud): 'thul na ni mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// lo dgu stong thub par 'gyur ro// yul 'khor ma rung bar bgyid par 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la dur khrod kyi shing gis zhugs bus la yungs ka
131a4(rgyud): dang / dug dang / khrag dang bsres la lan brgya stong sbyin sra dag bgyis na yul 'khor ma lungs par 'gyur ro// mar gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na zhi bar 'gyur// 
131a5(rgyud): ngag 'gum na tshes grangs dang skar ma bdam mi 'tshal ste lu/ nga thang gi shing gis zhugs bus la shing arga'i lo ma brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na zhag gsum na 'gu mo// shags
131a6(rgyud): 'gyed na rig pa bzlas brjod bgyis la gdong byugs na rgyal bar 'gyur ro// khros pa'i mdun du bzlas brjod bgyis na dga' bar 'gyur ro// yugs sa mo dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal bas yar gyi
131a7(rgyud): ngo zhag brgyad la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du me tog dkar po brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyid na dbang du 'gyuraro// dgra tshar bcad na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang / 
131a8(rgyud): phyug gi mdun du du ba ma mchis pa'i 'dam mar rgya skyegs kyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis na gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyuraro// mkho' 'gro ma thams cad kyi
131b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bcing ba yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o// chu srin kum bi ra'i kha bcing na gseg ma la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te chab tu bor na kha bcing bar
131b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// seng ge dang / stag dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang / rgyal po dang / chom rkun gyi nang du chud na bsam par bya'o// ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sangs rgyas
131b3(rgyud): kyi sku gzugs bri bar bya ste/ g.yon rol du ni lag na rdo rje/ g.yas rol du ni 'phags pa spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs po ni gser gyi mdog can du bri'o// lag na rba/ 
131b4(rgyud): rje ni lo bcu drug tsam lon pa'i gzugs 'dra la kha dog sngo/ bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bri'o// 'pha/ dgas pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi g.yas rol du
131b5(rgyud): ni lha mo bri/ de yang 'dam bu 'da' rgyu ltar dka' ba'o// 'pha gas pa spyan ras gzigs kyang de dang 'dra'o// lha mo nA pad+ma'i phreng bas rgyan par bri'o// de'i 'og rol du sgrub pa po
131b6(rgyud): pog por thogs par bri'o// sgrub pa po zla ba gcig gi bar du za su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing yar gyi ngo tshas brgyad la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis te/ lha mo la 'od zer byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 
131b7(rgyud): 'od zer de de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyuraro// de nas dngos grub du 'gyur te rgyal po nyid stsol to// yid kyi gang bsams pa de dag thams cad 'byor to// yar gyi ngo zla
131b8(rgyud): pabanya nas zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la pad+ma 'bum par na lha mo nyid mthong // dam pa gang blangs pa de rnyed de rgyal po nyid dam/ rig sngags 'chang nyid du
132a1(rgyud): 'gyuraro// tha ma banag gsum bsrung ba bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi cho ga rdzog so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag
132a2(rgyud): rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje ngas kyang gang gis rdo rje'i rigs dang / cho ga rgyas pa chen po gzhan dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags cho ga rgyas pa 'dir sbyin par bgyi'o// 
132a3(rgyud): de lta bas na cho ga rgyas pa thams cad du 'di gcig pu sbyar bar bgyi'o// lag na rdo rje 'di dran pa tsam gyis rig pa'i lha thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo// b+ha ga bad+d+haHoM ru ru s+phu ru dza/ 
132a4(rgyud): la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba ar+tha sA hA ni swAhA/ lag na rdo rje spyan/ 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir de bzhin ga/ deshegs pa bye ba phrag bcus dgongs te/ ngas kyang de ltar
132a5(rgyud): sems can rnams kyi don dang khro bo rnam dga' bar bya ba dang gdul da kA ba rnam 'dul ba'i phyir bshad// ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang lA na pas ma god pa'i ras la sprin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis
132a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gser gyi mdog can chos ston pa bri bar bya'o// de'i g.yas rol du 'phags pa lag ni rdo rje mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa chos nyan par bri'o// 
132a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon rol du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'dam bu 'da' rgyu ltar dkar ba skra'i thor tshugs dang / cod pan can stag lpags kyi shams thabs gyon pa
132a8(rgyud): lag na rnga yab thogs pa bri bar bya'o// de nas zla ba phyed zas su 'o skyo 'thung zhing rig pa bzlas brjed bya'o// des mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ ri ma
132b1(rgyud): gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas la rig pa lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i glo g.yas nas 'od zer byung ste lag na rdo rje la nub na grub par 'gyur ro// rgyal po nyid
132b2(rgyud): dam rig sngags 'chang nyid de dam pa gnyis sbyin par byed do// rgyal po nyid du gyur na rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang nyid du gyur na ni rig sngags
132b3(rgyud): 'chang drug khri'i bdag po nyo ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu'i lus su 'gyur ro// lo khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi skad shes par 'gyur ro// 
132b4(rgyud): slongs mo'i zas bza' zhing ri'i rtse mor ring bsrel dang bcas pa da'i mchod rten gyi drung du me tog dkar po zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar las bsnyugs pa 'bum sbyin bsreg bya zhing / lan
132b5(rgyud): 'bum bzlas brjod byas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs ma ngon sum du 'gyur te mthong nas gang sgrub pa de 'grub bo// su zhig rtag tu lan gsum brjod cing phyag kyang 'tshal na
132b6(rgyud): des de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag bcu la bsti stang byas pa dang / bla mar byas dang / rim gro byas pa dang / mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe shi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye bar
132b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnang ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la tsan dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor byugs te/ rig pa lan brgya stong bzlas brjod
132b8(rgyud): byas na de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu las thams cad las sbyar bar bya'o// mig la lan bdun bsngags na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i bdun du ldong
133a1(rgyud): ros la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas nas mig la bskus na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// rkang rjes kyis blangs la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ bud med gang
133a2(rgyud): gi mgo bor gtor na de dbang du 'gyuraro// bdag gi mchil ma lan bdun bsngags te thig le byas na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// gang gi ming nas brjod de yungs kar la lan brgyad brgya
133a3(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du bya na til nag po las lan brgyad brgya sbyin bsreg bya zhing ming nas kyang brjod na de dbang du 'gyuraro// kr-iSh+TaM tsa tur dang she na shwe ta/ puSh+Ta
133a4(rgyud): na ma aSh+Ta sa ha sre Na/ badz+ra pA Ni ra ha na ta ba bya/ ra dza pa dad ni ya sho ba titI/ ldong ros kyis lag mthil du gnags bris la ming nas brjod cing nyi ma la bltas te lan brgya/ 
133a5(rgyud): brgya bzlas brjod byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs te rtsig ngos la gzugs bris la mo ma tshan gyi steng du mdzub mo bzhag ste lan brgyad brgya bzlas
133a6(rgyud): brjod byas na dbang du 'gyuraro// spra tshol la gzugs byas te ldan pa g.yas par bzhag la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// gi wang dang / shu dag dang / dung gi lte ba dang / rgya
133a7(rgyud): spos rnams bsres te btags la rig pa lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas te zas dang skom dang / bzi' ba'i nang du btab na dbang du 'gyuraro// dur khrod kyi thal ba blangs la lag na rdo rje'i mdun
133a8(rgyud): du lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te gang la gtor ba de dbang du 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du me tog dkar po brgyad brgya gtor na dbang du 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi sol ba
133b1(rgyud): grangs te rtsig ngos la gzugs bris la shing ka ra bi ra'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad mo mtshan du phog par byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// ba lang gi lcibs lam lhung ba blangs te zhi ba'i mtshan gcig byas la
133b2(rgyud): de'i mdun du rtswa ku sha las mdung rtse gsum byas nyi ma gsum du yungs kar dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i bsregs blugs lan bdun bdun spyon sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// lag na rdo/ 
133b3(rgyud): rje'i mdun du ldum bu ba sha ka'i yam sreg shing brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyuraro// gzhon nu ma dbang du bya na a rang ga ni me tog brgya stong gis lag na rdo rje la phog par bya na gno// 
133b4(rgyud): nu ma dbang du 'gyur ro// yugs sa mo dbang du bya na lag dan rdo rje'i mdun du mon sran gre'u sbyin bsreg bya zhing ming na das kyang brjod na dbang du 'gyur ro// thal ba la lan bdun
133b5(rgyud): sngags kyis btab te bud med la gtor na dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med kyi mdun du rig pa lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod/ byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// shing bu sor bzhi pa blangs
133b6(rgyud): te g.yabs na 'ong zhing dbang du 'gyur ro// me tog dkar po blangs te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas la bud med mthong bar g.yabs na 'ong zhing dbang du 'gyur ro// gzhan
133b7(rgyud): yang las byed 'dod na bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i skud pa brkya na blang te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du nyis khugs dang bzhi khugs byas pa bzhag la bzlas brjod byas te gcig la gcig 'khril na
133b8(rgyud): dgongs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// gi'u wang sgrub par 'dod pas nyi ma bdun du bsu'i skyo 'thung zhing yar gyi ngo tshas bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/ lag na rdo rje la
134a1(rgyud): / mchod pa rgya cher byas la gi'u wang bad+ma'i steng du bzhag ste/ 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// 'bar nas blang bar bya'o blangs pa tsam gyis nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog dang ldan par
134a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad yid kyi bsams pa tsam gyis 'thung bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod par 'gyur/ lo dgu stong thub par 'gyur ro// zla ba phyed zas
134a3(rgyud): su 'o skyo 'thung zhing de nas rig sngags 'chang gis grog mkhar gyi sa las nor rgyas kyi gzugs byas la de'i steng du 'dug ste/ nam 'gul bar gyur gyi bar du rig sngags lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na
134a4(rgyud): longs spyod ster ro// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams ston par 'gyur/ lo lnga brgya thu dab par 'gyur/ bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ zas
134a5(rgyud): su 'o skyo 'thung zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na longs spyod gter te/ zla ba gcig go dra/ ra du slongs mo'i zas bza' zhing yar gyi ngo tshas bcu bzhi la
134a6(rgyud): zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje la mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la yong lhag par mchod de lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa nas bzung la rig sngags bzlas brjod byas te/ lag
134a7(rgyud): na rdo rje'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// 'gul bar gyur na grub pa thams cad kyis mthong bar 'gyuraro// yid kyis bsams pas kha zas 'byung bar 'gyur
134a8(rgyud): lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro// de nas gnad sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag sems can rnams
134b1(rgyud): don gyi srang du gsang sngags 'di lta bu gsungs pa ni ngo mtshar to zhes nas 'khor thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi cho ga rdzogs so// / de nas 'bru
134b2(rgyud): po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis bla gas phrag pa gcig la gzar nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan
134b3(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mig 'di ni rig pa thams cad kyi gtso mo lags te/ 'di dran pa tsam gyis bdag gis dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan
134b4(rgyud): 'das bdag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du bya nga chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la mog dbul dbar 'tshalo// 'thung po'i bdag po de bzhin du gyis shig/ 
134b5(rgyud): de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis lag na rdo rje'i nas gnyis la btugs nas lag na rdo rje la 'di skad du sa smraso// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod kyis rog sngags chen
134b6(rgyud): po'i ming 'di banasu gsol// nam ru drA ya/ le le/ l-i li li li/ ka mu kA ya swAhA// lig bu mig bud med kyi sgras bcings la rgya mtsho 'bab po'i chu klung gi ngos gnyis ka'i 'jim pa blangs pa'i nang du/ 
134b7(rgyud): bcug ste bsregs la dbang phyug chen po'i gan su song nas mar gyi ngo zhig brgyad dam bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsrung ba bya te 'ig bu rig nga la lan nga sa so sa gyung ba bya migal bahru nag ma ma ni
134b8(rgyud): dab du tsu/ sa kyi po// sun la dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs te mi'i thod pa la bdar nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byis pas thig la byas nagangs bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// sol ba yang
135a1(rgyud): bsgrub par bya ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du zas su chu dang phye'i 'dag gu za zhing mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te dur khrod du song la/ de nas thag bu la sbyang
135a2(rgyud): nul ba kro tsam byas te/ mchod pa chen po byas nas dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs te/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sol ba mo'i thod pa'i nang du bzhag la lag pas mnan te dud par 'thul
135a3(rgyud): bar gyur gyi bar du rig sngags bzlas brjod byas nas blangs te thig le byas na lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing / bsams pas kyang kha zas 'byung bar byed de tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur la/ dbang phyug
